It's a temporal space fighter that was created to combat a new strain of bacteria that appeared out of nowhere. A unique display stand is also included.
<!-- Although I would normally have used "inter-dimensional spaceship; "temporal space fighter" seems like the phrase that was used in the game, according to Wikipedia. -->
name: Vic Viper "Gradius 4" Ver. (びっくばいぱー げーむ ぐらでぃうす４)

subtitle: The younger, calmer of the twin sisters, figma Tsukasa!
description: From the anime "Lucky Star" comes a figma of the relaxed, kind Tsukasa Hiiragi, in her winter uniform!

- The new joint parts allow for smooth yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes. - A flexible plastic is used for the uniform and skirt, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability. - Two separate face parts as well as many different hand parts are included. The hands for the pose in the opening theme are also included. - Included is the mobile phone she got for getting good grades. - It's possible to change her face with other Lucky Star figma faces. - Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Tsukasa Hiiragi: Winter Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま ひいらぎつかさ ふゆふくver.)
copyright: © 美水かがみ/らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: The hammer that can pass through everything... by destroying it.
description: The newest in the long-running Device Metal Charm series, the Graf Eisen is used by Vita, one of the Wolkenritter, and is a destructive force like no other. The especially destructive hammer form is reproduced here in detail, with Vita's magic circle attached. Look forward to more additions to the metal charm series, coming soon!
name: Device Metal Charm Collection Series 04: Graf Eisen - Hammer Version (ぐらーふあいぜん でばいすめたるちゃーむ これくしょん)

subtitle: Who's there?!  Who is that, with the green body?!
description: Gatchapin, the character beloved by men, women and children of all ages, comes together with Scientific Ninja Team Gatchaman to form the Scientific Ninja Team, Gatchapin! The first, Gatchapin Mk. 1, cuts a dashing figure in his white suit and helmet, the very image of a hero who stands for peace and justice, who stands unafraid to face the evils of the world in order to protect its people. Remove his helmet to reveal his secret identity! Who could he be?! The fight for peace is far from over!
name: Nendoroid Gatchapin Mk. 1 (がっちゃぴんいちごう ねんどろいど)
copyright: © タツノコプロ・フジテレビKIDS

subtitle: A magical change of size and shape!
description: Pastel Ink, the magical teacher from the smash hit English teaching aid and TV anime Moetan, returns in Nendoroid form! This figure is based on the same illustration by POP as her larger 1/8 scale version, and features three faces, one smiling, one crying, and a special treat for fans, her adorable blank, exhausted face. Also included are her magic wand, Majimelo, so you can recreate "moetan corner", and a Nendoroid-sized version of her pedestal, the Pop-up Vignette!
name: Nendoroid Pastel Ink (ぱすてるいんく ねんどろいど)
copyright: © ぱすてるインク応援団

subtitle: Reissued yet again from the king of SD figures!
description: The unbelievable demand for this soft, adorable figure has compelled Good Smile to reissue the Haruhi Suzumiya Nendoroid again! With three interchangeable faces and numerous extra parts, the Nendoroid connoiseur can pose her pointing her finger, arms akimbo or even sticking out her tongue! All these detailed, lovable and incredibly silly features are truly what make the Nendoroid series fun both to play with and to display! In fact, she seems to scream "Every one of you should buy three of me!"
name: Nendoroid Haruhi Suzumiya (すずみやはるひ ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: A top idol's awakening!
description: From the popular idol training simulator on the Xbox360 "IDOLM@STER" comes Miki Hoshii, Awakening version. The normally carefree girl is now aiming to be a top idol, and her determination truly is "Awakening". Her hair has been changed to a much shorter cut hair style, and her image has gone through a complete change. Miki has changed her image to be an "idol" aiming straight for the top, this really is a figure necessary for any IDOLM@STER fan to own. Also includes the Princess' tiara and the drill arm that featured in the game.
name: Miki Hoshii Awakening ver. (ほしいみき かくせいばーじょん)

subtitle: Great Looking!! The New Star of Hope!
description: From the popular idol training simulator on the Xbox360 "IDOLM@STER" comes Miki Hoshii, New Star of Hope version. Boating some of the best looks and proportions, she was the newcomer that 765 professionals had high expectations for. Her fresh charm was expressed with an impressive pose in the Xbox360's signature IDOLM@STER song "GO MY WAY!!". On the stage, her natural charm allows her to shine as a true "idol", this is truly an item that will make IDOLM@STER fans ecstatic! Also includes the cat ears and cat paws that featured in the game.
name: Miki Hoshii New Star of Hope ver. (ほしいみき きたいのしんじんばーじょん)

subtitle: The little devil that descended from the skies
description: The main heroine of Love-Ru, the slapstick comedy love story with a sexy twist which has been airing as a TV anime since spring, Lala Satalin Deviluke makes quite an impression with her energetic pose and unusual outfit. Holding her wand in one hand and smiling happily, she gives off the same adorable energy from both the manga and TV series. Her right hand can also be replaced for another, wandless pose.
name: Lala Satalin Deviluke (らら さたりん でびるーく)
copyright: ©矢吹健太朗・長谷見沙貴／集英社・とらぶる製作委員会

subtitle: The beautiful warrior. Battle action can now unfold in the palms of your hands.
description: From the new anime "Ikkitousen Great Guardians", Kanu Unchou from Seito Academy has been made into a figma.

- The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose various different scenes. - By using flexible plastic, the proportions are kept without compromising the posability. - 3 different face parts as well as multiple hand parts are included, which makes reproducing many situations easy. - Torn, ripped up clothes can replace the originals to reproduce battle scenes. - Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Kanu Unchou (かんううんちょう ふぃぐま)

subtitle: Collecting meal tickets, bringing water, placing plates down...
description: Max Factory's second stage of "The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi" figures is going at full steam! Wearing the waitress uniform from the Cultural Festival's tea house, comes "Mikuru Asahina Culture Festival Ver."! She can be put together with the Tsuruya-san that is already on sale, and greet customers while holding her tray in one hand. She comes with cat ears that match Tsuruya-san's cat ears, and if displayed with Tsuruya-san their tails can twist around each other. They can be displayed together as an incredibly loveable catgirl pair!
name: Mikuru Asahina Culture Festival Ver. (あさひなみくる ぶんかさいばーじょん)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: An ace among aces, she's a strict yet kind teacher!
description: Dressed in her teaching corps uniform, Nanoha Takamachi, the heroine of the recently concluded TV anime series Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS, shows off her kinder side in this figure based on a magazine cover illustration. Expertly sculpted down to the last detail, even the clear-cast pedestal shows a remarkable level of care.
name: Nanoha Takamachi Teaching Corps Uniform ver. (たかまちなのは きょうどうたいせいふくばーじょん)

subtitle: The self-proclaimed Chief Maid, who excels in cooking.
description: From the popular dating sim game and TV anime "They are my Noble Masters" comes the Kuonji family's head maid, Venice. A great cook with a fierce dedication to her craft, Venice looks elegant and refined with her long skirt trailing behind her and a lock of red hair in her hand, in contrast to her usual energetic self. When displayed by her side, the previously released Shinra Kuonji makes a perfect complement to this gorgeous figure, showing off their relationship as master and servant.
name: Venice (べにす)
copyright: © みなとそふと／きみある製作委員会

description: The kind hearted golden flash has been made into a figure! Mission Start!!
From "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS" comes a figma of the Lightning Squad's captain, Fate T. Harlaown dressed in her barrier jacket.

- The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes. - A flexible plastic has been used, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability. - Two separate face parts as well as many different hand parts are included, allowing for increased posability. - Fate's weapon Bardiche is included and can change between the three forms, "Assault", "Harken" and "Zamber". - A large, trailing mantle makes battle scenes more realistic. You can choose whether you prefer to have the mantle on or off. - Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Fate T. Harlaown: Barrier Jacket ver. (ふぃぐま ふぇいと・T・はらおうん ばりあじゃけっとver.)

subtitle: Fuujin, launch! The Sky Girls are taking off!
description: From the anime "Sky Girls" comes one of the exoskeleton Sonic Divers that the heroines ride. It's been sculpted as a poseable figure that can shift between modes. The second Sonic Diver, "Fuujin", piloted by Karen Sonomiya is skilled at mid and long range combat. Depending on which you prefer, you can switch Raijin into one of these three modes: the high-speed acceleration G-Mode, the reinforced exoskeleton A-Mode which was used in battles, or the AS Mode, which was used for solo missions. The Karen Sonomiya figure is also included. Fan's waiting for the Raijin figure won't be disappointed!
name: Sonic Diver Fuujin (そにっくだいばー ふうじん)
copyright: © 2007　Konami Digital Entertainment Co.Ltd/スカイガールズ製作委員会

subtitle: Fly through the blue skies, submerge into the deep seas, this is an all-purpose battleship!
description: From the 1968 drama "Mighty Jack" comes the almighty battleship "Mighty Gou", also known as the MJ-Gou, which the main characters rode to battle against the evil secret organization. It's been sculpted in Fewture Models EX Alloy. The prototype sculpting was done by Shouichi Manabe, who has a lot of past experience dealing with special effects mecha. The model spans an impressive 30cm, and includes 6 of the on-board planes. It’s even larger than the garage kit that was released in 2001; and it's back looking better than ever!
name: EX Alloy Mighty Jack: Mighty Gou (えくすごうきんまいてぃじゃっく・まいてぃごう)

subtitle: A girl in a crimson dress, with crimson eyes and crimson hair.
description: From the Nitroplus game released in May 2006 "Kishin Hishou Demonbane" comes "Another Blood", a mysterious girl in a crimson dress. She is shown in an impressive crimson costume that symbolizes blood, with a mischievous facial expression and pose. Through the skirt made from clear PVC, you can see her captivating thighs. The "Crimson Girl" is a figure that's needed by any fan.
name: Another Blood (あなざーぶらっど)

subtitle: Unto an unknown region....
description: From the shooting game with a long history behind it "Gradius", comes a plastic model kit of the well-known spaceship, the Vic Viper. It's one of the many variations of the ship, and was modeled after the Vic Viper from the PS2 "Gradius 5" game. It's a temporal space fighter that was created to combat a new strain of bacteria that appeared out of nowhere. A unique display stand is also included.
name: Vic Viper "Gradius 5" Ver. (びっくばいぱー げーむ ぐらでぃうす５)

subtitle: The never ending battle between good and evil!!
description: ATELIER-SAI brings you the third figure set in the new "Battle Soldiers" series as a part of the revolutionary "GENEBLOCK" toy series. The battle between the "Guardian Side" and the "Bloody Sword Side" is still going on.The figures are created with a simple framework, which creates warriors that can be moved and played with easily. Each character has their own specific weapon included. Once you've collected all the warriors in the series, you'll be able to create an original powered up warrior!
name: BATTLE SOLDIERS 3 (ばとるそるじゃーず だい３だん)

subtitle: To all those who have supported us
description: The small and cute Nendoroid Petit Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya trading figures make another appearance with this special mid-year set, which shows all the principal characters in their colorful school swimsuits and holding floatation rings imprinted with the signature H logo. Each also comes with a pedestal designed to evoke a playful poolside image, making for a wondeful package out just in time for the mid-year Bon festival. (Swimsuits are color-coded and imprinted with each character's name.)
name: Nendoroid Petit Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya Special Bon Festival Set (すずみやはるひのゆううつ おちゅうげんせっと ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: A completely normal human brings some excitement to the figma world.
description: From "The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi" comes the SOS Brigade's one and only ordinary human, "Kyon", unexpectedly made into a figma!

- The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes. - His stylishly worn uniform is made with a flexible plastic, so he is able to pose doing a wide variety of actions. - Also, to recreate Kyon's hunched back, it's possible to move the base of his neck. Using this, many subtle expressions can be made. - Two faces are included, the expressionless face, and the disappointed face. A hand set, as well as indoor slippers are included, making it possible to recreate the dance in the ending theme. - The included portable video camera can be used to recreate scenes where Kyon was filming, making fans of these scenes happy. - Comes with a poseable figma stand, that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Kyon: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま きょん せいふくver.)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: My cuteness will cure all that ails you!
description: Melissa Seraphy, the selfish princess from Unison Soft's popular game "Wagamama Capriccio", is the next to get the super-deformed treatment in this adorable Nendoroid figure.

Just like her larger 1/8 scale version, she has a removable pumpkin skirt with clear eyes and mouth, as well as four different faces, one smiling, one neutral, one angry, and finally one based on a fan-favorite illustration, which practically screams "thanks fer buying me!" with a sarcastic sneer.
name: Nendoroid Melissa Seraphy (めりっさ せらふぃ ねんどろいど)

subtitle: How exiting! A steaming hot spring!
description: Mixed bathing in an outdoor hot spring!? These PVC figures have been sculpted based on the front cover image of "My-Otome Garderobe Academy Scoop-Up" which is currently on sale from Ichijinsha publishers. It’s a bath scene with the six girls: Arika, Akane, Mashiro, Nina, Erst and Nao. The steam looks like it'll rise up at any second, so grab these sexy Otome bath figures, before it’s too late!
name: Otome Girls Bath Figures (おとめたちのおふろふぃぎゅあ)

subtitle: The luckiness will never end! figma Konata!
description: From the anime "Lucky Star" comes the anime and game loving high school student Konata Izumi, dressed in her winter uniform, as a figma!

- The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes. - A flexible plastic is used for the uniform and skirt, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability. - Two separate face parts as well as many different hand parts are included. The hands for the pose in the opening theme are also included. - Included is Konata's favorite chocolate coronet, as well as hair pieces to hide the hole where the stand connects. - It's possible to change her face with other Lucky Star figma faces. - Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Konata Izumi: Winter Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま いずみこなた ふゆふくver.)
copyright: © 美水かがみ/らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: "Moe" is essential! figma Mikuru Asahina!
description: From "The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi" comes the kind, carefree Mikuru Asahina in North High School's uniform, as a figma!

- The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes. - A flexible plastic is used for the uniform and the skirt, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability. - Focusing on her breasts and her hips, Mikuru's perfect proportions were re-calculated. The difference in the SOS Brigade member's heights was also re-calculated. - You can change Mikuru's face to her frightened, crying face, allowing you to enjoy having the facial expression you want her to have. - Comes with a poseable figma stand, that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Mikuru Asahina: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま あさひなみくる せいふくver.)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: Assault of the unidentified fiancée!!
description: From the very popular manga "Kemeko Deluxe", which has recently has an anime version announced in the 15th anniversary issue of Dengeki, comes the mysterious heroine, MM. Although she usually confines herself to her human-like robot "Kemeko", MM is now energetically jumping out! Her tight bodysuit shows off her nice body! If you join this figure with the separately sold "Nendoroid Kemeko Plus", you can effectively recreate the scene on front of the first volume of the manga!!
name: MM (えむえむ)
copyright: © いわさきまさかず/メディアワークス

subtitle: The combat maid who adores her master with a pure heart!!
description: From Alice Soft's territory control game "Big Bang Age", comes the combat android maid Shion. She was sculpted by “Sunny Day” from the popular Cerberus Project group. Her expressionless, childish face goes together well with her maid costume. Her frilly skirt, as well as the wings on her back have been created with an incredible amount of detail, and are a must-see for any figure collector!
name: Shion (しおん)

subtitle: Coming from Max Factory is the nendoroid to put together with MM!
description: From the very popular manga "Kemeko Deluxe", which has recently has an anime version announced in the 15th anniversary issue of Dengeki, comes Max Factory's first ever nendoroid, "Kemeko"! With its expressionless face and body, the Kemeko nendoroid truly is different to the rest, and made exactly how the original meant it to be. Comes with head parts that open to reveal the passenger MM, as well as a gatling gun to increase play value. Make sure to get the separately sold "MM" to complete the set!
name: Nendoroid Plus: Kemeko (けめこ ねんどろいど)
copyright: © いわさきまさかず/メディアワークス

subtitle: The sophisticated fencer in a miko outfit!
description: From Alice Soft's territory control game "Big Bang Age", comes one of the heroines "Senna Kyoudou". The popular kit made by Cerberus Project's French Doll has been made into a PVC figure! She's dressed in a miko outfit, with a Japanese katana by her side. Her always cheerful expression has been frozen in this figure forever - her happy smile truly is an amazing sight.
name: Senna Kyoudou (きょうどう せんな)

subtitle: Season two is here!  Are they still petite?  You bet!
description: The small and cute action figures, the Nendoroid Petite series, returns with another set from Lucky Star. Apart from Konata Izumi, the lineup is completely different from the first set, with more minor characters like Yutaka Kobayakawa and Nanako Kuroi getting their chance to shine. Each has one figure dressed in the trademark school uniform, but they all have a different alternate costume such as a cheerleader outfit or maid uniform, making them perfectly collectible and perfectly adorable. Collect them all, and look forward to more Nendoroid Petite fests, coming soon!
name: Nendoroid Petit Lucky Star Season 2 (らきすた しーずんつー ねんどろいど ぷち)
copyright: © 美水かがみ/らっきー☆ぱらだいす © TYPE-MOON

subtitle: With precision, quality and feel like no other, this is the definitive Tachikoma.
description: Good Smile is proud to bring you, at long last, its first alloy toy, the Good Smile Alloy Tachikoma! In development for over a year, this veritable marvel of uncompromising engineering precision was created from the ground up to be the very best, the definitive Tachikoma. The hatch can open to reveal a detailed rendition of the cockpit, the motion is smooth and tight enough to recreate even the most demanding poses from the show, its parts can be exchanged for multiple configurations, and it even includes an action figure of Motoko Kusanagi! Our palpable love for this little tank has driven us to perfection, and we are proud to have delivered the result of our compulsion. We only hope you enjoy playing with it as much as we did designing it.
name: GOODSMILE Alloy Tachikoma (ぐっどすまいるごうきん たちこま)
copyright: © 士郎正宗・Production I.G/講談社・攻殻機動隊製作委員会

subtitle: More and more figures for the battle between good and evil!
description: ATELIER-SAI brings you the second figure set in the new "Battle Soldiers" series as a part of the revolutionary "GENEBLOCK" toy series. The battle between the "Guardian Side" and the "Bloody Sword Side" has only just begun.The figures are created with a simple framework, which creates warriors that can be moved and played with easily. Each character has their own specific weapon included. Once you've collected all the warriors in the series, you'll be able to create an original powered up warrior!
name: BATTLE SOLDIERS 2 (ばとるそるじゃーず だい２だん)

subtitle: V.I.P trading figures make the jump from 2D to 3D!
description: The V.I.P series of collectible trading cards, which assembles illustrations from popular artists, is moving from 2D to 3D with this first set of V.I.P trading figures! Hand picked from the existing V.I.P repertoire, these figures from Comic Party, To Heart and To Heart2 are a perfect addition to any collection.
name: SMILE800 V.I.P Trading Figures (すまいるはっぴゃく ぶいあいぴー とれーでぃんぐふぃぎゅあ)
copyright:
© 1999 AQUAPLUS © 2001 AQUAPLUS 
© 2004 AQUAPLUS © アクシア

subtitle: A shining silver body! Naked Tachikoma?!
description: The popular EX Alloy Tachikoma with a built in light system is back in a new "Naked Color Ver."! Just as the name suggests, this time Tachikoma has a silver body, with red LED pod lights on his back. The two manipulator arms as well as all four legs use ball joints for posing. You can switch the equipped grenade launcher for a heavy machinegun. This time you also get a special Tachikoma hand cloth with your figure!
name: EX Alloy Tachikoma Naked Color Ver. (えくすごうきんたきこま ねいきっどからーばーじょん)
series: Ghost in The Shell S.A.C 2nd GIG
copyright: © 士郎正宗・Production I.G/講談社・攻殻機動隊製作委員会

subtitle: The handsome psychic, figma Itsuki!
description: From "The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi" comes the mysterious transfer student Itsuki Koizumi! Finally all five members of the SOS Brigade are available!

- The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes. - His neatly worn uniform is made with a flexible plastic, so he is able to pose doing a wide variety of actions. - The background of the school classroom is included, so you can recreate scenes in the clubroom. If you have all five of them, you can completely recreate the dance from the ending theme! - To allow more action poses to be taken, it's possible to move the base of his neck. This also allows much more natural positioning. - Comes with a poseable figma stand, that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Itsuki Koizumi: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま こいずみいつき せいふくver.)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: Make commuting a more stylish affair.
description: These fashionable card cases feature images from two TV anime series, with one sporting a cute image of the Special A cast, and the other with the strange creatures from Potemayo causing trouble for the main character yet again. Designed to keep your favorite characters close as well as to facilitate travel, these card cases can hold a transit pass or ID in order to prevent loss, while still allowing it to be scanned by an automatic reader. Be sure to pick one up!
name: Special A and Potemayo Character Card Case (すぺしゃるえー ぽてまよ きゃらくたーぱすけーす)
copyright:
© 2008 南マキ・白泉社／白選館学園高校理事会
© 御形屋はるか／ぽてまよ製作委員会

subtitle: The strongest servant. dawned in jet black armour
description: From Fate/Stay Night comes a figure of Saber Orta, a character consumed by darkness. Originally released as a garage kit created by Satoshi Toda, but now available as a 1/8 scale PVC figure! Not only was the size of the original increased, but more attention was also paid on increasing the overall detail of the figure. This figure has been upgraded in more more ways than one, and it's now good enough to not only have reached the Bishoujo category of figures, but it also wouldn't be exaggerating to say its become an absolute work of art. Two different heads are included, one with a mask, and one without, so you can decide how you'd prefer to display her.
name: Saber Orta (せいばーおるた)

subtitle: The biggest figma yet! The Nanoha Takamachi figma takes off!
description: The invincible ace Nanoha Takamachi from "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS" has been released as a figma in her Barrier Jacket!

- The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes. - A flexible plastic is used, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability. - Two separate face parts, two separate fringe parts, as well as many different hand parts are included, allowing for increased posability. - Her twin tails also have ball joints inserted, to allow for more action scene poses. - The included Raging Heart Excelion can change from Axel Mode to Buster Mode. - Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Nanoha Takamachi: Barrier Jacket ver. (ふぃぐま たかまちなのは ばりあじゃけっとver.)

subtitle: Fighting block warriors!
description: ATELIER-SAI brings you the new, revolutionary "GENEBLOCK" toy series, and as a part of it comes a new series of figures known as the "BATTLE SOLDIERS", which depicts a war between two rival factions, the "Guardian Side" and the "Bloody Sword Side". The figures are created with a simple framework, which creates warriors that can be moved and played with easily. Each character has their own specific weapon included. Once you've collected all the warriors in the series, you'll be able to create an original powered up warrior!
name: BATTLE SOLDIERS (ばとるそるじゃーず)

subtitle: A temporal space fighter designed to combat bacteria!!
description: From the shooting game with a long history behind it "Gradius", comes a plastic model kit of the well-known spaceship, the Vic Viper. It's one of the many variations of the ship, and was modeled after the Vic Viper from the "Gradius 2" game. After this release, a Vic Viper from each of the Gradius games is planned to be released. A unique display stand is also included.
name: Vic Viper "Gradius 2" Ver. (びっくばいぱー げーむ ぐらでぃうす２)

subtitle: Always accomplishes orders! The cool headed sniper, charges forward!
description: Shuraki, the collaboration between Red Entertainment and Good Smile, has its fourth entry in Needa Schuetlitch. The Trinity Box includes a figure, drama CD and art booklet, ensuring total immersion in the Shuraki world.

Needa's figure is sculpted and colored in detail to evoke the cool, intelligent sensibility that surrounds her character. With her enormous gun and bayonet in hand and dressed in a military uniform with muted coloration, Needa looks quite different from the previous Shuraki figures. As usual though, her clothes can be exchanged for a damaged version to give her a more... colorful appearance.

As the story of the Crimson Silk Princesses reaches its climax, the Shuraki series has its most exciting entry to date! Entitled Zero and the Guardians of the Akasic Records, the fourth entry in the Shuraki drama CD series assembles an all-star cast of voice actors to focus on Needa Schuetlitch, the strongest and most renowned of them all. As before, the high quality background music is performed by Elements Garden, with Saeko Chiba, Needa's voice actress, singing her main theme, entitled Anfang.

Featuring a character biography and introduction, dictionary of terms, comments from the drama CD's cast and of course a massive amount of concept art by Yamashita Shunya, the character's principal designer, this booklet is simply jam-packed with materials to immerse the reader even further in the Shuraki world.
name: Shuraki Trinity Box 04: Needa (にーだ しゅらき)

subtitle: The Otome in a race-queen outfit.
description: Hirokazu Hisayuki is well-known as the character designer and animation director of the My-HiME and My-Otome series. This is part of a figure series that is putting all three characters from the front cover of his art book "MAIHIME-Hirokazu Hisayuki -Art Works-" into beautiful figures. This is a figure of Lena Yuuki from "Future GPX Cyber Formula: A New Challenger ". In relation to the other characters, she was Arika's mother in My-HiME. This time around she has been released in a race queen's outfit. Her slender, beautiful bodyline is definitely something to take note of. The three are positioned just like the original illustration, so they'll look best arranged as they did in the illustration.
name: Lena Sayers Soft Vinyl Figure (れな・セイヤーズ そふびふぃぎゅあ)

subtitle: Chuchu's going to make you her slave!
description: From the March 2007 game ChuxChu Idol and its upcoming fan disc comes the cute and sexy vampire Chuchu Astram. Like the popular Melissa Seraphy of Wagamama Capriccio fame, Chuchu is based on a concept illustration by Akifumi Ozawa, and sculpted in detail under his supervision. Her breastpiece is clear-cast for extra sexiness, and the bat that hugs her waist has bendable arms, so you can arrange or remove it as you see fit. Also look out for her friend and caregiver Pixie Hiyori, coming soon.
name: Chuchu Astram (ちゅちゅ あすとらむ)
copyright: © 2006,2007 ユニゾンシフト / SOFTPAL Inc.

description: As part of the revolutionary "GENEBLOCK" series brought to you by ATELIER-SAI, comes the 8th set of figures in the "EX Series" which was designed by Souma. This time we see the arrival of the huge robots known as the "EX-BANNARET2", they come combined with 4 runners, and the three weapons they wield are the sword, the spear and the bow. If you combine them with the rest of the EX series, you can have great fun creating your own personal mecha!
name: EX-08 EX-BANNARET2 (えくすばなれっと２)

subtitle: In a class of it's own... the legendary maid!?
description: Hirokazu Hisayuki is well-known as the character designer and animation director of the My-HiME and My-Otome series. This is part of a figure series that is putting all three characters from the front cover of his art book "MAIHIME-Hirokazu Hisayuki Art Works-" into beautiful figures. She was the main character in My-HiME, and a legendary Otome in My-Otome - the wonderful Mai Tokiha is here! The secrets to her popularity are her overflowing motherly love for her younger brother, her long red muffler, and her ample bust. The three are positioned just like the original illustration, so they'll look best arranged as they did in the illustration.
name: Mai Tokiha Soft Vinyl Figure (ときはまい そふびふぃぎゅあ)

subtitle: Halberd in hand, the eternal goddess of ice shines!
description: Shuraki, the collaboration between Red Entertainment and Good Smile, has its fifth entry in Rizephis Rutetiva Mendeau. The Trinity Box includes a figure, drama CD and art booklet, ensuring total immersion in the Shuraki world.

Based on a specially commissiond concept illustration, Rizephis Rutetiva Mendeau is expertly sculpted to fit her role as the last Shuraki figure. Wearing an elegant dress reminiscent of high renaissance-era fashion, holding her Pact Winds, her halberd, and smiling pleasantly, there's something mysterious about her. Perhaps exchanging her clothes for the stimulating battle-damaged version will reveal what it is.

This final volume of the Shuraki series assembles an all-star cast of voice actors to bring the Crimson Sillk Princess' story to a close. Entitled Gently Stroke the White Raven's Wing, this volume focuses on Rize's story as a huge shakeup threatens White Raven itself. The high quality background music is once again composed by Elements Garden, with Ryoko Shintani, Rize's voice actress, performing her character's signature song, entitled Clear Drops.

Featuring a character biography and introduction, dictionary of terms, comments from the drama CD's cast and of course a massive amount of concept art by Takumi Yano, the character's principal designer, this booklet is simply jam-packed with materials to immerse the reader even further in the Shuraki world.
name: Shuraki Trinity Box 05: Rize (りぜ しゅらき)

subtitle: The tough trouble maker with a cute face~♪
description: The action shooting game "WarTech: Senko no Ronde" has become popular with arcade game fans. A sequel to the game was been announced, and it looks better than ever. While we wait for the sequel, a energetic figure of Baek Changpo has arrived! From all the colorful costumes that were available, the pilot suit with the most impact was chosen, it let's Changpo be displayed in the cutest way possible! The transparent one-piece dress can be removed and replaced whenever you like.
name: Baek Changpo (ぺくちゃんぽ)

subtitle: The energetic, clumsy Otome!
description: Hirokazu Hisayuki is well-known as the character designer and animation director of the My-Hime and My-Otome series. This is part of a figure series that is putting all three characters from the front cover of his art book "MAIHIME-Hirokazu Hisayuki -Art Works-" into beautiful figures. From My-Otome comes the energetic Coral maid "Arika Yumemiya"! Her dream is to become a Meister Otome, like her mother was before her. The three are positioned just like the original illustration, so they'll look best arranged as they did in the illustration.
name: Arika Yumemiya Soft Vinyl Figure (ありか・ゆめみや・そふびふぃぎゅあ)

subtitle: From a legend, to a myth...
description: From the shooting game with a long history behind it "Gradius", comes a plastic model kit of the well-known spaceship, the Vic Viper. It's one of the many variations of the ship, and this time it was modeled after the Vic Viper from the "Gradius 3" game. It was the most angular and stylish design out of all the designs in the series, and that proud design has been recreated. Following this release, a Vic Viper from each of the Gradius games is planned to be released. A unique display stand is also included.
name: Vic Viper "Gradius 3" Ver. (びっくばいぱー げーむ ぐらでぃうす３)

subtitle: The best of the best. An absolute beauty in a sailor suit.
description: Part of the "Ikkitousen" figure series by wani books! This time you can decorate your room with the popular "Special A" warrior Kanu Unchou. This figure has different colors to the limited edition version that was sold in wani books magazine - this version has an impressive black outfit. Kanu has been beautifully sculpted shouldering her weapon "Reienkyo", with an expression that draws out her fighting spirit. She's wearing a short skirt and loose socks, just as people have come to know her, and you're bound to be satisfied with her unbelievably nice body. Parts of her clothes can be removed.
name: Comic Gum Figure Collection: Kanu Unchou Cerberus Project Ver. (Black X White Version) (こみっくがむふぃぎゅあこれくしょん かんううんちょう けるべ)

subtitle: Three amusing miniature dioramas from Jaguar!
description: Three miniature dioramas have been sculpted from the series "Pyuu to Fuku! Jaguar!", based on original illustrations. Each scene has recreated a gag perfectly. The author of the manga, Kyosuke Usuta said himself that he wanted to use the figures as references when he draws the manga! Even the back of this figure will get a smile out of you; it's a figure that any fan will be impressed with.
name: Deluxe Miniture Diorama: Pyuu to Fuku! Jaguar! 02 "The Wandering Robot" (ぴゅーとふく！ジャガー02 るろうのロボ)

subtitle: How'd you like to be her butler?
description: The TV anime based on the popular dating sim game "They Are My Noble Masters", or Kimiaru for short, has started airing, and Shinra Kuonji, main heroine and heir to the Kuonji house, comes to life in this gorgeous figure. Wearing a short skirt and smile, she exudes a sense of confidence and kindness befitting her status. Her long hair and cloak illustrate the detail with which this statue is sculpted, and she goes well with the upcoming figure of the Kuonji maid, Venice.
name: Shinra Kuonji (くおんじ しんら)
copyright: © みなとそふと／きみある製作委員会

subtitle: Three amusing miniature dioramas from Jaguar!
description: Three miniature dioramas have been sculpted from the series "Pyuu to Fuku! Jaguar!", based on original illustrations. Each scene has recreated a gag perfectly. The author of the manga, Kyosuke Usuta said himself that he wanted to use the figures as references when he draws the manga! This really is a flood of sound; you'll have a new expression for every different angle that you look at it from!
name: Deluxe Miniture Diorama: Pyuu to Fuku! Jaguar! 01 "Flood of Sound" (ぴゅーとふく！ジャガー01 おとのこうずい)

subtitle: Bathing in the summer sun, comes the smiling princess of the Moon Kingdom.
description: "Yoake mae yori ruriiro na" is a popular PC game by August, which has had an anime based on it, which aired in Spring 2007. This is a PVC figure of the series' heroine Feena Fam Earthlight. Feena, the girl with an ever-strong sense of justice, is standing with an embarrassed expression in her tantalizing bikini pose. Both her hat, and her colorful pareo can be removed, so you display her however you prefer.
name: Feena Fam Earthlight (ふぃーなふぁむあーしゅとらいと)

subtitle: Piercing eyes and a calm exterior
description: Continuing from the Saber and Rin Tohsaka maid figures, Rider gives off a mature vibe that fits her long skirt and apron, but her piercing gaze still recalls Rider's base personality, creating a playful contrast. Her glasses are a separate etched part, so you can keep or remove them according to your preference.
name: Rider ~Modest Fantasy Maid Version~ (らいだー もうそう つつましきめいどへん)

subtitle: This reissue is all part of his plan!
description: The Nendoroid version of Light Yagami, AKA Kira, the main character of the mega-hit show Death Note, is being reissued! Scheming, smiling and angry faces make this Nendoroid exceptional even among the other Nendoroids, and illustrate the dichotomy between his Light And Kira personalities. The package also includes his signature Death Note and mechanical pencil, along with the handcuffs that bind him to his rival L. This little guy can make adorable even the most serious scene from the manga or anime.
name: Nendoroid Light Yagami (やがみらいと ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 大場つぐみ・小畑健／集英社・ＶＡＰ・マッドハウス・ＮＴＶ・Ｄ．Ｎ．ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: "Magical Change" she shouts, springing from the mind of POP.
description: Pastel Ink, the magical teacher and director of Moetan, the famous English training software and anime, comes to life in this beautiful rendition featuring the Vignette pedestal. In her white school swimsuit and knee-high socks, she's a perfect representation of the moe mentality. Her right hand can be replaced, with one version holding the stick of her MajiMelo lollipop, and the other with an open palm. POP, the character's designer, had direct control of the design team, resulting in a faithful adaptation which should entice even those unfamiliar with the source material.
name: Pastel Ink Popup Vignette (ぱすてるいんく ぽっぷあっぷヴぃねっと)
copyright: © ぱすてるインク応援団

subtitle: She'll debut in your heart!!
description: From the ever popular "Lovely Idol", which recently had a live DVD go on sale, comes a figure of Mizuki Sakaki. The figure was sculpted standing in a pose from the anime version's ending theme, using the original character design from Madoka Hirayama's sketches. She's standing in a very idol-like position, as if she was firing a gun. It's a bit different to her usual calm image - when she's on the stage she delivers her cheerful, honest smile straight to you!
name: Mizuki Sakaki (さかきみずき)
copyright: © 2006 Omegavision, Inc. ／PUBLISHED BY ENTERBRAIN, INC. ／らぶドル製作委員会

subtitle: The exceptional, small and cute trading figure series is back!
description: The popular Nendoroid Petite Haruhi series is back with a new set! Ryoko Asakura and Kyon's little sister make an appearance this time, and each character has two separate poses, making a total of 11 figures, including the secret one. Naturally, this set goes well with the first, so the discerning Nendoroid fan can expand their petite world even further.
name: Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya Nendoroid Petite #02 (すずみやはるひのゆううつ＃２ ねんどろいど ぷち)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: "If you are justice, then I... I am evil!"
description: From the 1995 film "Mechanical Violator Hakaider" comes a soft vinyl statue of Hakaider sculpted by the sculpting genius Takayuki Takeya. Hakaider was the dark hero who wanted to destroy the warped "justice" and "order" of the world. The image of the hero created by Director Keita Amemiya has been excellently recreated in this figure. Now he can take his rival Michael on! The white base included with the figure beautifully contrasts against the black figure.
name: Mechanical Violator Hakaider (じんぞうにんげんはかいだー)
copyright: © 東映・東映ビデオ・石森プロ

subtitle: It's the mega-cute Nendoroid, Tsuruya-san!
description: Tsuruya-san, famous consultant to the SOS Brigade, gets super-deformed in this, the fourth Haruhi Nendoroid. In addition to her normal face, she includes her puppet face, as seen in Asahina Mikuru's Adventures episode 00, as well as a laughing face. She also comes with several bonus parts to complete the puppet motif, as well as to change her into her maid uniform from the school festival, complete with a tray for serving drinks. Her headband can also be removed and replaced with pieces from the other Haruhi Nendoroids. Line them all up together to recreate any scene from the show!
name: Nendoroid Tsuruya-san (つるやさん ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: Sorry to disappoint... It's a guy.
description: Bridget has featured since the second game in the Guilty Gear series. He's a cross-dressing boy, but he's got many diehard fans because of that. He's cute and blushing, some of the specialties of the prototype sculptor Kawanishiken, who has made a gender-neutral charm. The large handcuffs around his hips and body, as well as his yoyo weapon were carefully sculpted. We hope you enjoy this figure that blends cuteness, with uncertainty.
name: Bridget (ぶりじっと)

subtitle: Her singing echoes all over the world.
description: Luca, one if the heroines from the Playstation 2 RPG "Ar Tonelico 2", has already been made into a figure! Her energetic, cheerful charm has been posed by sculptor Masanori Kuroda, the same sculptor behind Max Factory's Haruhi. Her vivid colors, characteristic clothes and the uplifting feeling the figure gives, truly make it a work of art.
name: Luca (るか)

subtitle: The iron castle, towering in your room!!
description: The start of the giant robot boom, the mecha that everyone knows, Mazinger Z! That Mazinger Z has become a soft vinyl figure by the hands of the worldwide known H.L PRODUCT, and has finally landed in Japan! It's sculpted with a very detailed design, as a robot should have. It's so detailed in fact, that it almost looks as if it's made out of metal. The neck, shoulders, and wrists have many articulation points for posing. Take this towering 600mm silhouette home with you!
name: Big Mazinger Z Soft Vinyl Figure (びっぐまじんがーぜっと そふびふぃぎゅあ)

description: Staying true to the design from the fantasy world of the MMORPG "Lineage II" comes this popular character model, the "Dark Elf Female". Just by looking at the skilled sculpting, you can tell that her sexy charm has been reproduced without fail. Her weapon, " The Sword of Miracles" has been included, and the mantle around her hips can be removed, giving the figure a lot of extra value.

Due to various circumstances around the production of this figure, the re-release of this figure will be limited to 2000 copies. There have been many requests for a re-sale, so we apologise to any customers who are unable to get this figure.
[Official Site] http:www.lineage2.jp/goods/character_3.aspx
name: Dark Elf Female (だーくえるふふぃーめーる)
copyright: 2003-2006 © Copyright NCSoft　Corporation. All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: Three amusing miniature dioramas from Jaguar!
description: Three miniature dioramas have been sculpted from the series "Pyuu to Fuku! Jaguar!", based on original illustrations. Each scene has recreated a gag perfectly. The author of the manga, Kyosuke Usuta said himself that he wanted to use the figures as references when he draws the manga! You'll experience all sorts of feelings depending on what angle you look at it from; it's 360 degrees of fun! Hani's grinning face and Hammer's awkward half-way down pants are some of the highlights of the figure!
name: Deluxe Miniture Diorama: Pyuu to Fuku! Jaguar! 03 "My wonderful brother..." ~No, no, this is perverted...!~ (ぴゅーとふく！ジャガー02 すてきなおにいさん…)

description: The star is finally here! figma Haruhi Suzumiya!
From "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" comes a figma of the unrivalled main heroine "Haruhi Suzumiya", in her familiar North High School uniform!

- The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes. - A flexible plastic is used, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability. - The uplifting design of the figure truly embodies Haruhi herself! - There are indoor slippers, a megaphone as well as the SOS Brigade chief armband included as optional parts. - Three face parts are included so you can enjoy Haruhi posing with the expression you want her to have. - Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Haruhi Suzumiya: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま すずみやはるひ せいふくver.)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: Even shinigami need to be reprinted!
description: The extremely popular Nendoroid figure of Ryuk, the shinigami who essentially caused all the events of Death Note, is being brought back for another run! With articulated wings and mouth, this figure makes it possible to recreate all of Ryuk's silly poses from the show, and the included apple and Death Note make for an extra dose of his ridiculousness. The included pedestal even allows for a flying pose! As is the norm for the Nendoroid series, this figure is of the highest quality, and should satisfy any fan's Ryuk craving.
name: Nendoroid Ryuk (りゅーく ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 大場つぐみ・小畑健／集英社・ＶＡＰ・マッドハウス・ＮＴＶ・Ｄ．Ｎ．ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: A sexy fighter wearing a maid outfit!!
description: Part of the "Ikkitousen" figure series by wani books! Sculpted by Cerberus Project comes the second in the series - the submission master "Ryomou Shimei". Her well-known maid costume and knee socks are both black, a different color variation to the version that was sold in Comic Gum. Her trademark eyepatch, handcuffs, choker and breast ribbon have all been painstakingly detailed, and her far too short maid outfit reveals her long, sexy legs.
name: Comic Gum Figure Collection: Ryomou Shimei Cerberus Project Ver. (Pearl Black Version) (こみっくがむふぃぎゅあこれくしょん りょもうしめい けるべろすぷろじぇくと ぶらっくぱーるばーじょん)

subtitle: A sexy monster from deep in the dungeon!
description: The Succubus, a boss monster from the popular MMORPG Mabinogi, is shown here in a rendition befitting her enormous popularity. Next to Nao, the navigator, she may be the most popular character from the game, which has gained a massive following since its 2005 Japanese release. The succubus is known for losing some of her clothes after taking damage, and as such we've included a replaceable battle-damaged skirt which shows off her gorgeous legs. She also goes well with Nao, despite being on opposite sides of the battlefield.
name: Succubus (さきゅばす)
copyright:
Developed by devCat
Copyright (c) 2007 Nexon Corporation and Nexon Japan Co.,Ltd. All rights reserved.

subtitle: With a very mature air about her, comes the sexy Kotona!
description: Kotona Elegance is one of the two heroines from the anime Zoids Genesis. In 2006 a figure of her was put on sale in a swimsuit, and quickly became popular. Now, prototype sculptor Chieri has once again made a new PVC figure of Kotona for the 2007 WonFes. Wearing a well-known costume from the anime, she's sitting on a chair in a very alluring pose. For both the people who have Kotona in her swimsuit and those who don't, this is one figure you'll want to get your hands on!
name: Kotona Elegance Costume ver. (ことなえれがんす こすちゅーむばーじょん)
copyright:
© 1983 2007 TOMY
© ShoPro・TV Tokyo
ZOIDS is a trademark of TOMY Company,Ltd.and used under license.

subtitle: Max Factory's first "figma.BP", a new potent tag name!
description: "figma.BP Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion, Lelouch Lamperouge" has been released as part of the "figma" action figure series! He's been sculpted with perfect proportions, to preserve the scenes he poses!

- The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes. - Parts of his uniform are made from a flexible plastic, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability. - Includes impressive optional parts such as the Zero mask, a gun. a cellphone, as well as Arthur the cat. Arthur can also wear the Zero mask. - Includes a face part with an activated geass, as well as a grinning face part. Many different hand parts are included, allowing for increased posability. - Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma.BP Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion: Lelouch Lamperouge. (figma.BP こーどぎあす はんぎゃくのるるーしゅ るるーしゅ・らんぺるーじ)
series: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion

subtitle: The birth of the Fairytale series that makes use of a new type of runner!
description: This figure is part of the "GENEBLOCK" series brought to you by ATELIER-SAI. A brand new toy series making use of the freshly developed multi-runners has started! The series has been titled the "Fairytale Series", and the first set of figures is modeled off "Alice in Wonderland". The main character Alice, as well as the bunnies, and card soldiers have all been made into GENEBLOCK toys. The simplicity of making various situations with the toys has become even easier with the new "multi-runners". With these new parts the GENEBLOCK world is going to be expanding!
name: Fairytale Series 01: Alice in Wonderland (おとぎしりーず０１ ふしぎのくにのありす)

subtitle: The smile she showed in that brief moment.
description: Following the Ayu Tsukimiya figure from the popular PC game "Kanon", comes Makoto Sawatari. Makoto has no idea who she is, or where she came from - she has amnesia, but she wants to exact her revenge for something that happened in the past. Using the original illustrations as a model, you really can feel the happiness of the moment captured in her smile. For fans who really know how special the smile is, be sure to get your hands on it and feel it for yourselves.
name: Makoto Sawatari (さわたりまこと)

subtitle: The popular soft vinyl series of giant robots are finally back on sale!
description: Mazinger Z has arrived as part of the large soft vinyl "Gigabyte" series of figures, brought to you by Fewture. It stands an unbelievable 82cm in height. The Jet Pileder on the head can be removed, so you can recreate the "Pileder, on!" scenes. Both arms, the head, the ankles, wrists and elbows have moveable parts for posing, so you can pose it however you want! All three figures in this series have been released simultaneously, so be sure to check them all out.
name: Gigabyte Mazingerz Modeling Color (ぎがばいとまじんがーぜっと もでりんぐからーばーじょん)

subtitle: The popular soft vinyl series of giant robots are finally back on sale!
description: The king of the cosmos, "UFO Robo Grendizer" has been re-released as part of the large soft vinyl "Gigabyte" series of figures, brought to you by Fewture. The guardian robot that came from the Planet Fleed to Earth, stands an incredible 82cm. Both arms, the head, the ankles, wrists and elbows have moveable parts for posing, so you can pose it however you want! All three figures in this series have been released simultaneously, so be sure to check them all out.
name: Gigabyte UFO Robo Grendizer Modeling Color Ver. (ぎがばいとゆーふぉーろぼぐれんだいざー もでりんぐからーばー)

subtitle: A ready to assemble mechanical bug army!
description: As part of the revolutionary "GENEBLOCK" series brought to you by ATELIER-SAI, comes the 7th set of figures in the "EX Series", designed by Souma. This time it's an insect series! Parts of the wings make use of clear runners, so they look beautiful even as insects. The joint parts are the same as the rest of the EX series, so you can rearrange parts from other figures. The originality of this series is increasing with ever release!
name: EX-07 EX-INSECT (いーえっくす０７ えくすいんせくと)

description: The petite part is what makes 'em special ← Proven hypothesis

The Nendoroid Petite line, the newcomer to the Nendoroid world, has its second entry with this series from the popular anime, game and all-around media sensation Lucky Star. All your favorite characters, like Konata Izumi and Kagami Hiiragi, have gotten together to form this collectible set. Wearing school uniforms, swimsuits, cheerleader outfits and even shrine maiden uniforms, these figures are certain to quench any fan's thirst for more Lucky Star. Be on the lookout for more Nendoroid Petite sets, coming soon!
name: Lucky Star Nendoroid Petite Season 01 (らきすた しーずんわん ねんどろいど ぷち)
copyright: © 美水かがみ/らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: The popular soft vinyl series of giant robots is finally back on sale!
description: The Garada K7 has finally been re-released as part of the large soft vinyl "Gigabyte" series of figures, brought to you by Fewture. This was the first mech that was ever sent off by Baron Ashura - the leader of the underground empire. It stands an impressive 82cm high. The sickles on his head can be removed and used as boomerangs. The missiles in its eyes can also be removed. All three figures in this series have been released simultaneously, so be sure to check them all out.
name: Gigabyte UFO Garada K7 Modeling Color Ver. (ぎがばいとがらだけーなな もでりんぐからばーじょん)

subtitle: The debut of the new "figma" action figures.
description: The launch of the new generation action figures "figma" by Masaki Asai and Max Factory is finally here! The first figure to be released as a figma is the silent humanoid interface Yuki Nagato from "The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi". She is filled with features, including her vivid color!

- The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes. - It wouldn't be Nagato without the included optional parts like her book and her pipe chair. - Different face parts are included - as expressionless as she is, fans will be able to tell the subtle differences. - You can change her fringe hair so that she's wearing her glasses, so you can reproduce the image she had in the first half of the story. - Multiple hand parts are included, so you can make as many varied positions as you like. - Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Yuki Nagato: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま ながとゆき せいふくver.)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: The randomly appearing, never speaking pandas?!
description: From SNK PLAYMORE's popular DS game "Doki Doki Majo Shinpan", comes the hidden characters you need to find throughout the game, the backwards pandas! They have all been sculpted as soft vinyl figures. You can use them to leave your mood for the day up to the witches to decide! Black (A bad feeling, as if you've lost your way), Red (A fiery feeling, accompanied with a devilish mood), Pink (You feel like you're in love, a cute mood.), Blue (Feeling a little blue, or maybe a refreshed mood) or Orange (a warm, fuzzy feeling with a luscious mood). There is also a secret figure, and with all 6 you can keep predicting your mood for the day!
name: Backwards Pandas' Exiting Moods? Majo Shinpan! Soft Vinyl Figures (ぎゃくぱんだのどきどききょうのきぶん？しんぱん！)

subtitle: Green and red, rally the fleet and head to the battlefield!
description: The Vic Viper from the popular TV game "Gradius" recently featured in the anime "Skygirls" as mankinds secret weapon. That Skygirls version of the Vic Viper has now been released as a plastic model in a limited edition "Personal Color" version, which featured in episode 24 of the anime. The Green version is being released at the same time, so you can build up a fleet of Vic Vipers! As an extra bonus, a 1/60 scale and a non-scale GENEBLOCK version of Reijin (Fuujin Color ver.) has been included.
name: Vic Viper "Skygirls" Ver. Limited Edition Personal Red Color (びっくばいぱー あにめ「すかいがーるず」 しょかいげんてい)
copyright: © 2007　Konami Digital Entertainment Co.Ltd/スカイガールズ製作委員会

subtitle: The new GENEBLOCK set is based on service vehicles!
description: As part of the revolutionary "GENEBLOCK" toy series brought to you by ATELIER-SAI, comes the 6th set of figures in the "EX Series", designed by Souma. This time the they've been based off things you often see everyday in the cities - service vehicles. A lot of useful parts were made while creating the vehicles, such as caterpillar treads and tires - these new parts allow for even more variation in the GENEBLOCK series. The joint parts are the same as the rest of the EX series, so you can rearrange parts from the other figures in the series. The originality of this series is increasing with every release!
name: EX-06 EX-VEHICLE (いーえっくす０６ えくすびーくる)

subtitle: From the youngest sister to Mizuho's mother - this is a broad collection in more than one way.
description: The revival of the Please! series will be seen with two DVD boxsets being released. One in June 2008 - the Please Teacher MEMORIAL BOX, and the other in September 2008 - The Please Twins MEMORIAL BOX. Following the popular "Please! Taraku Collection" comes the new "Please! Hot Spring Collection". Each of the characters has been sculpted in a very unladylike way, undressing just before getting into a hot spring!
name: COLLECT800 Please! Hot Spring Collection. (おねがいおんせん)
sculptor: Max Factory (Yuji Kudo - Masanori Kuroda - Tetsuya Yamada)

subtitle: She's back again, soft and cool as ever!
description: Yuki Nagato from The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya is usually pretty emotionless, but with this Nendoroid, you can make her smile! Naturally, another of the numerous replaceable faces includes her glasses, making it possible (with the included chair) to recreate a scene of her reading in ths SOS Brigade's club room! The accessories that come with her are so numerous that any collector should be glad to add this adorable figure to his shelf.
name: Nendoroid Yuki Nagato (ながとゆき ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: Green and red, rally the fleet and head to the battlefield!
description: The Vic Viper from the popular TV game "Gradius" recently featured in the anime "Skygirls" as mankinds secret weapon. That Skygirls version of the Vic Viper has now been released as a plastic model in a limited edition "Personal Color" version, which featured in episode 24 of the anime. The Red version is being released at the same time, so you can build up a fleet of Vic Vipers! As an extra bonus, a 1/60 scale and a non-scale GENEBLOCK version of Reijin (Raijin Color ver.) has been included
name: Vic Viper "Skygirls" Ver. Limited Edition Personal Green Color. (びっくばいぱー あにめ「すかいがーるず」 しょかいげんてい)
copyright: © 2007　Konami Digital Entertainment Co.Ltd/スカイガールズ製作委員会

subtitle: She's soft and cute and just for you!
description: From the hit TV anime Zoids Genesis comes the second half of the adorable Nendoroid team, Rei Mii! Like the previously released Kotona Elegance, this tomboyish beauty is reduced to Nendoroid proportions, and includes a conveniently sized version of her Zoid, Lanstag. She also comes with a large hunk of barbecued meat, which is about the only thing she can cook. Display her with Kotona for a fun dance party!
name: Nendoroid Rei Mii (れ・みぃ ねんどろいど)
copyright:
© 1983 2007 TOMY
© ShoPro・TV Tokyo
ZOIDS is a trademark of TOMY Company,Ltd.and used under license.

subtitle: Don't you think it looks mega awesome on her?
description: The fifth in Max Factory's "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" figure series. This time it's the SOS Brigade's honorary advisor Tsuruya-san! She's an older student who's highly strung, but always puts a smile on the faces around her. She has been sculpted in the waitress outfit she wore to the Cultural Festival, having this moment captured in a figure truly is "mega awesome". She comes with cat ears and a tail. You can also replace her right hand. Take the mega awesome Tsuruya-san along with the other characters in the series home with you!
name: Tsuruya-san (つるやさん)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: The most powerful Grimoire, even in this cute form, it's Nendoroid Al Azif!
description: Al Azif, the main heroine from Nitro Plus' popular PC game Zanma Taisei Demonbane, has become the newest addition to the Nendoroid family! Her three interchangeable faces, one normal, one haughty and one angry, show off her personality, and her many accessories like her helmet and clear-cast familiar, solidify her as an essential addition to any Nendoroid collection.
name: Nendoroid Al Azif (ある・あじふ ねんどろいど)

description: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES 03 Scopedog Turbocustom
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES 03 Scopedog Turbocustom (すこーぷどっくたーぼかすたむ)

subtitle: Her true identity is that of the powerful experiment "N9 Fantastica"
description: Misae Makimoto, the main heroine from the novel version of Nitroplus' PC Game "Jingai Makyou" has been sculpted in her N9 Fantastica form through a joint effort between Solid Theater and Satoshi Toda. Toda's outlook on sculpting truly is fascinating. Her muffler is swaying in the wind, and her waistline is as perfect as you'd expect. If you peek beneath her skirt you'll see her wonderful legs and bottom, both of which have had an incredible amount of effort put into them, to keep this figure the gem that it should be.
name: Misae Makimoto Fantastica Ver. (まきもとみさえ ふぁんたすてぃかばーじょん)

subtitle: I can never stop travelling.
description: From the hit 2001 Dengeki series comes Kino, the main character of Kino's Journey, a girl with short hair and a masculine demeanor who travels around the world with her talking motorcycle Hermes. Holding her favorite gun, a Colt Peacemaker called "The Cannon," Kino stands hip cocked with a calm look on her face. Clear-cast smoke pours from the gun's muzzle, demonstrating this figure's spectacular craftsmanship. This detailed rendition of a beloved character truly threatens to immerse any onlooker in the series' unique setting.
name: Kino (きの)
copyright: © 時雨沢恵一/メディアワークス

subtitle: The lovely yet selfish queen of the fairy world.
description: From the world of Shinkyoku Soukai Polyphonica, in which fairies and humans live together in peace, comes Corticarte. She may look like a cute, innocent young girl, but she's actually a red fairy queen in human form, and a moody, pompous one at that. This gorgeous figure, based on the cover illustration of the third novel, shows Corticarte with skirt fluttering and long hair waving behind her. Sculpted in exquisite detail, she is certain to please.
name: Corticarte Apa Lagranges (こーてぃかるて・あぱ・らぐらんじぇす)
copyright: © 榊一郎／ツゲ神曲楽士派遣事務所

subtitle: The servant dressed in black. Return to Zero.
description: From the Fate/Zero novel, a prequel of Fate/Stay night, which explains the events in the forth Holy Grail War, comes Saber in a dark, cold suit. Completely different to any Sabers we've seen before, her stiff personality has been excellently sculpted based on the original illustration. It is also possible to let her wield Excalibur.
Her master Kiritsugu Emiya will also be available to complete the Fate/Zero combo.
name: Saber/Zero (せいばーぜろ)

subtitle: The big breasted warrior in a fluttering china dress.
description: Part of the "Ikkitousen" figure series by wani books! It's Hakufu Sonsaku in her china dress that featured in the 1st volume of the manga! She has been released wearing a black china dress - a different color variation to the version sold in Comic Gum. The sculpting was done by the popular sculpting group "Cerberus Project", and they have created a 1/7 scale figure that is overflowing with a lovable uplifting feeling. Look forward to the upcoming figures of Ryoumo and Kanu, which are also planned to be released as a part of this series!
name: Comic Gum Figure Collection: Hakufu Sonsaku Cerberus Project Ver. (Black Version) (こみっくがむふぃぎゅあこれくしょん そんさくはくふ けるべ)

subtitle: The God of Destruction is back! And his name is Genesic!
description: Allow us to bring you the latest news! The first in Max Factory's Alloy series, the "Max Alloy Genesic GaoGaiGar" was the revival of the 4 year old GaoGaiGar series. Now, by popular demand, the God of Destruction is back, and has palm and pointing hand replacements, allowing for more variations in the scenes that you can pose. However, the original figure has stayed true to it's form, it's simply had a few touch ups to reach the "FINAL Ver." This new strength truly is the final fusion!
name: Max Alloy Genesic GaoGaiGar - Final Ver. (がおがいがーふぁいなる)
series: The King of Braves GaoGaiGar Final

subtitle: Battle is nothing more than a game.
description: Bringing the arcade to the consumers comes a figure of Ino, from the popular arcade fighting game "Guilty Gear XX". Wearing her glossy fetish costume, the mysterious Ino looks around with a challenging eye. The cool, sexy image she had in the game has now been sculpted into a figure by the popular prototype sculptor Mitsumasa Yoshizawa, who has left many fans in awe by showing his true work. Be sure to notice the precise detail put into the guitar and belt too.
name: Ino (いの)

subtitle: Just a quick break... a traveler's rest.
description: Max Factory's second Wendy figure from the anime series "Gun X Sword" has arrived! Sculpted using the original illustrations from the character designer Takahiro Kimura, the focus was keeping the "soft" feeling of the image. Also notice the sex appeal made by the crevice in the panties and her wonderful thighs. Caught defenceless whilst changing, a truly dioramic pose for a figure.
name: Wendy Changing Ver. (うぇんでぃ きがえ)
copyright: © 2005 AIC・チームダンチェスター/ガンソードパートナーズ

subtitle: Fully poseable action ♪  The innocent, energetic girl ♪
description: Announcing 1/6 scale collectible character figures from the popular Xbox360 and arcade game "THE iDOLM@STER"! The first set of figures consists of Haruka Amami and Ritsuko Akizuki. Haruka Amami is the bright, cheerful main heroine. Pointing hand parts are included, so you can pose her however you want to. She's wearing a cloth dress and her fully poseable body will allow you to enjoy all sorts of dance poses!
name: Haruka Amami (あまみはるか)

subtitle: The second batch of 5cm Lucky Star trading figurines! Re-released due to popularity!
description: FREEing's "Lucky Star Figure Collection Vol.2" has been re-released due to it's popularity! This second set of characters is completely different to the first set! The popular supporting characters Yutaka and Minami have both been added to this collection. Just like the first collection, each character has replaceable arm parts included, so you can display them in more ways than one. If you continue to collect all these figures, the Lucky Star world in your room can become twice as exiting!
<!-- as awesome as the 曖昧5センチ reference is - it just can't be captured in English -->
name: Lucky Star Figure Collection Vol.2 (らき☆すた ふぃぎゅあこれくしょん ぼりゅーむ２)
copyright:
© 美水かがみ/らっきー☆ぱらだいす
※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: And essential item for every commuter's arsenal!
description: These card carriers are made from high-quality acrylic, and feature unique designs laser etched into their surfaces. The first Shakugan no Shana carrier shows Shana with red hair and eyes, with a firey background, while the second features her silhouette in pearly white, the rest of the case stained yellow, fading to orange. The Horo and Kino cases feature real cloth used to create a unique texture, and finally the Palmtop Tiger case is set against a marbled yellow and white background. Put a transit pass or other machine-read card inside for easy access, and these cases make commuting with your favorite anime character that much easier and safer, with an included chain to prevent loss. Truly a perfect product for both fans and commuters.

Hecate/Toraigon Shakugan no Shana red hair and eyes card case, Shakugan no Shana silhouette card case, Spice and Wolf Horo card case, Kino's Journey card case, Toradora! "Palmtop Tiger" card case are all available.
name: Dengeki Character Card Carriers (でんげききゃらくたーぱすけーす)
series: Shakugan no Shana, Spice and Wolf, Kino's Journey, Toradora!
copyright:
© 高橋弥七郎・いとうのいぢ・メディアワークス/灼眼のシャナⅡ』製作委員会・MBS
© 支倉凍砂・メディアワークス 「狼と香辛料」製作委員会
© 時雨沢恵一/メディアワークス　イラスト/黒星紅白
© 竹宮ゆゆこ/メディアワークス　イラスト/ヤス

subtitle: The Hecate from Shakugan no Shana, in cell phone strap form!
description: Toraigonrezar, the staff used by the King of the Crimson World, comes to you as a cell phone charm, complete with a highly durable leather strap meant to stand up to heavy use. With a metal plate engraved with the title and logo attached to the strap, this charm makes a fashionable and useful accent to any cell phone, as well as a pleasant reminder of this extremely popular anime and novel series.
name: Hecate/Toraigonrezar Leather Cell Phone Strap (へかてー とらいごん れざーけいたいすとらっぷ)
copyright: © 高橋弥七郎・メディアワークス/「灼眼のシャナⅡ」製作委員会・MBS

subtitle: Multi-colored robot warriors!!
description: As part of the revolutionary "GENEBLOCK" toy series brought to you by ATELIER-SAI, comes the 5th set of figures in the "EX Series", designed by Souma. This time they're the familiar looking warriors, the "EX-TROOPER3" robots. Depending on how you put them together, you can make all kinds of variations - block toys hide unlimited possibilities!. If you combine these with the rest of the series, you can have great fun creating your own personal mecha!
name: EX-05 EX-TROOPER3 (いーえっくす０５ エクストルーパー３)

subtitle: The pedigree American shorthair, born in the older parts of Tokyo.
description: Based on the popular 4-panel manga written by Kenji Sonishi, which was made into an anime "Cat Ramen", comes a soft vinyl figure of "Taichou". His real name is William Thomas Jefferson the Third. He's a stylish guy - he's wearing his indigo apron and his twisted headband. Now you can also come and pick up some of Taichou's love-packed original ramen!
name: Taichou (William Thomas Jefferson the Third) Soft Vinyl Figure (たいしょうそふびふぃぎゅあ)
copyright: © そにしけんじ／マッグガーデン・猫ラーメン本舗

subtitle: The cruel, assassin in search of the Holy Grail,
description: From the Fate/Zero novel which tells the story of the 4th Holy Grail War - 10 years before Fate/Stay night - comes Saber/Zero's master, the famed "Magus Killer" Kiritsugu Emiya. A man who always follows through with his beliefs using tragic methods. These "methods" often involving shooting others in the back.

It was sculpted using an impressive key visual as the model. In his right hand is his favorite Thompson Contender pistol, which can be switched with a cigarette. You can connect his stand to Saber/Zero's stand and display the master and servant together.
name: Kiritsugu Emiya/Zero (えみやきりつぐ)

subtitle: Hami's here, and he's kinda big.
description: A live action version of the Shounen Jump manga "Pyuu to Fuku! Jaguar" has been confirmed! From that series comes the popular character "Hami" as a large vinyl figure! Both his cuteness and his powerful presence have been recreated in this figure. The strong contrast between the cute Hamidento and the trampled Hammer will tickle any fan's fancies. The figure includes a cord that can be pulled out from Hami's pants.
name: Hami Soft Vinyl Figure (はみぃそふびふぃぎゅあ)

subtitle: Fully poseable action ♪  The intelligent, chairman type idol ♪
description: Announcing 1/6 scale collectible character dolls from the popular Xbox360 and arcade game "THE iDOLM@STER"! The first set of figures consists of Haruka Amami and Ritsuko Akizuki. Ritsuko Akizuki is a reliable girl who wears glasses, but she's also blessed with a very nice body. Interchangeable hand parts are included so that you can switch her into her thinking pose, allowing you to pick the pose you prefer. She's wearing a cloth dress and her fully poseable body will allow you to enjoy all sorts of dance poses!
name: Ritsuko Akizuki (あきづきりつこ)

subtitle: Golden hair and armor shining, this lady of the battlefield is ready for action!
description: Shuraki, the ambitious project by Red Entertainment and Good Smile, has its third entry in Char Rhousemann. Featuring a figure, drama CD and booklet, the Trinity Box set offers the ultimate Shuraki experience.

Based on a specially commissioned concept illustration, Char Rhousemann's figure is sculpted and colored in exquisite detail. She is the daughter of a noble family, and as such exudes a refined air and a sense of pride obvious to any onlooker. Recalling the uniforms of French noblemen, her dazzling dress complements her flowing hair, and can of course be exchanged for a battle-damaged version to expose more of her perfect skin.

The plot thickens in the newest Shuraki Drama CD. The past of Char Rhousemann, one of the Crimson Silk Princesses, is examined more closely is examined more closely in this third installment of the series, entitled Wildefrau's Paradise. Set once again to the high-quality musical stylings of Elements Garden, the complements the program perfectly, as does the character's song, entitled Blue Eyes, performed by Yukari Tamura.

Featuring a character biography and introduction, dictionary of terms, comments from the drama CD's cast and of course a massive amount of concept art by Itou Ben, the character's creator, this booklet is simply jam-packed with materials to immerse the reader in Shuraki's world even further.
name: Shuraki Trinity Box-03: Char (しゃる しゅらき)

subtitle: The silver body that accumulates data daily.
description: As a part of FEWTURE MODELS's soft vinyl series, comes the third version of the popular AI walker Tachikoma from the series "Ghost in The Shell S.A.C". This is Tachi Silver, who was researched as an experimental unit after leaving the lab. For these experimental purposes, his body was repainted silver, and his back pod was replaced, making him a unique walker. Enjoy this figure together with the other two in the series: Tachikoma and Tachi Yellow.
name: Tachi Silver Soft Vinyl Figure (たちこまんず たちしるばー そふびふぃぎゅあ)
copyright: © 士郎正宗・Production I.G/講談社・攻殻機動隊製作委員会

description: Nendoroid #4, Nendoroid Yasagure Rin!
name: Nendoroid Yasagure Rin (やさぐれりん ねんどろいど)

subtitle: Nendoroid Drössel. Long-awaited by all, except mankind.
description: From Disney Japan's first ever CG animation series 'Fireball' comes a Nendoroid of the robot princess Drössel - and she is still able to take her signature poses even with her cute deformed Nendoroid proportions!

Many of the parts from the series have been carefully recreated to reproduce the exact feeling from the show without disappointing fans, and while adding more and more possibility and charm to the figure. Not to mention that the head part is loaded with a lighting device to light up her beautiful ocean blue eyes in the dark, creating a truly unique Nendoroid!
name: Nendoroid Drössel (どろっせる ねんどろいど)

subtitle: Eats without digesting - keeping whatever is inside perfectly safe.
description: From the popular show Usavich, which recently saw it's third season released on DVD, comes a soap dish featuring the frog who lives in Putin's cell 'Leningrad'. As a frog that eats anything that moves, he has been placed with his mouth wide-open, as if about to eat the soap!
Place him by your sink, and let him enjoy the soap to the fullest!
name: Leningrad Soap Dish (れにんぐらーど そーぷでぃっしゅ)
copyright:
© 2009 MTV Networks, a division of Viacom International Inc. All Rights Reserved.
USAVICH:USAVICH and all related logos, titles and characters are trademarks of MTV Networks, a division of Viacom International Inc.

subtitle: The ever adorable nyoro~n Churuya-san.
description: From the series that preceded the second season of 'The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi', drawn by Eretto - 'Nyoron Churuya-san' comes the smoked cheese loving girl, Churuya-san, in a most suiting Nendoroid form.

Her signature 'Nyoro~n' pose can be recreated, and a table with a knife, fork and some smoked cheese are also included for her to have a feast at. The drooling face she made whenever she saw smoked cheese is also included.
It's filled with extras for fans to enjoy, and is sure to put you into a nyoro~n mood yourself!
name: Nendoroid Churuya-san (ちゅるやさん ねんどろいど)
series: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya-chan & Nyoron Churuya-san
copyright: © 谷川流・いとうのいぢ／えすおーえす団 © ぷよ／えすおーえす団 © えれっと／えすおーえす団

subtitle: The sniper of Team Gurren. A more realistic take on Yoko!
description: The beautiful sniper Yoko from the ever popular TV series and movie, 'Gurren Lagaan' is back again as a figure from Max Factory.

As a slightly different image to the original work, Yoko has been sculpted in a more realistic manner, creating a new exquisite presence. From the details on her tight hot-pants and knee-socks to the smallest of details on her fingertips and facial expression - Yoko has been brought to life as a zealous 1/6 scale PVC figure. A visor is also included and can be attached to create a more stylish image.
There are many Yoko figures around, but this is one with a very distinct charm that collectors are bound to fall in love with.
name: Yoko: Real Image ver. (よーこ りあるいめーじばーじょん)
copyright: © GAINAX・中島かずき/アニプレックス・KDE-J・テレビ東京・電通

subtitle: Warning: Not edible.
description: Based on the popular 'Character Vocal Series 03: Luka Megurine' comes an adorable charm of the ever popular chibi character 'Taco Luca'. Designed with her hair as octopus legs, she makes for a very different, yet still adorable creation to add to your collection.
Three variations are available, including a smiling face, a laughing face and a drooling face. A different colored jar is also attached to each charm.
name: Character Charm Collection: Tako Luka (きゃらくたーちゃーむこれくしょん たこるか（えがお／ばくしょうがお／よだれがお）)
copyright: © 三月八日/Crypton Future Media, Inc.

subtitle: The best princess in the world.
description: From supercell's beautiful PV 'World is Mine', with music composed by ryo and graphical designs by redjuice, comes this regal figure of 'Princess' Miku. She has been sculpted in an identical pose to the original illustration - her charming eyes gazing deeply ahead, as she lies relaxed on a comfortable bed with her cute, yet selfish expression suiting her pose perfectly.

As a new idea to bring a new sense of interior design to figures, the stand has been created as a frame, allowing you to display her in a range of new ways! Besides displaying the figure simply by itself, you can now also use the frame to display her as a wall-mounted decoration, or a leaning ornament. The frame comes in two colors, 'Brown' and 'Natural', allowing you to pick the color that suits your room best!
name: supercell feat. Miku Hatsune: World is Mine (Natural Frame) (すーぱーせる ふぃーちゃりんぐ はつねみく わーるどいずまいん なちゅらるふれーむ)

subtitle: Four cute chicks and a transvestite...
