description: Usavich is a story that follows the carefree life of rabbits that are imprisoned in a Russian prison, and from that series comes this toothbrush holder featuring the Chick Brigade!

Four toothbrushes can be stored safely in between the five chicks, so you can use it as a couple or in a family without troubles - being surrounded by the cute chicks is sure to make brushing your teeth a little more enjoyable!
Although... it seems Komanech managed to get mixed in with the cute chicks as well...
name: Komanech & Chicks Toothbrush Holder (ひよこまねち はぶらしほるだー)
copyright:
© 2009 MTV Networks, a division of Viacom International Inc. All Rights Reserved.
USAVICH:USAVICH and all related logos, titles and characters are trademarks of MTV Networks, a division of Viacom International Inc.

subtitle: Stick with your favorite characters at all times!
description: The characters from Usavich, a story that follows the carefree life of rabbits that are imprisoned in a Russian prison, have been placed onto 3D pins for fans to display wherever they please!

Two variations of the pins are available - a set of the main characters are all collected in the "All-Stars Set" and a set of Russian folk craft in the "Matryoshka Set". Take the characters you love and place them on your bag, use them as a replacement for thumb-tacks on your walls, or any other way you can think to use them.
name: Usavich Pins (Matryoshka Set) (ぴんず まとりょーしかせっと)
copyright:
© 2009 MTV Networks, a division of Viacom International Inc. All Rights Reserved.
USAVICH:USAVICH and all related logos, titles and characters are trademarks of MTV Networks, a division of Viacom International Inc.

subtitle: A petite and cute race queen set!
description: The Nendoroid Petite: Vocaloid RQ Set that has been seen on the official stgt support site and blog, as well as many events, is now being released as official goods from Miku Hatsune and Studie GLAD Racing.

The three most popular Vocaloid ladies: Miku Hatsune, Rin Kagamine and Luka Megurine are all posed in the cutest ways whilst wearing racing queen outfits that are actually currently in use by racing queens. An umbrella is also included

But that's not all! A pull-back car based on the Miku GT Car that was actually used in races is also included! You can display them all together to recreate a scene from the racing tracks. The pull-back car comes in two colors - black or white. Pick whichever you'd prefer!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Vocaloid RQ Set - Black ver. (ぼーかろいど RQせっと ぶらっくかーらーばーじょん ねんどろいどぷち)
copyright: © CryptonFutureMedia / © Studie GLAD Racing　　　※VOCALOIDはヤマハ株式会社の登録商標です。

subtitle: An all new alloy series, GO!
description: The all new alloy figure series from Art Storm, 'ES Alloy' is here! ES, or "Excellent Short" style, is a compact, deformed figure style that allows the figures to take many poses, allowing them to be displayed in various enjoyable ways!

The first to be released in this series is the main mecha from "Sengoku Majin GoShogun" - the GoShogun itself! The figure includes plenty of weapon parts allowing you to recreate the three bodies of the GoShogun - the King Arrow, the Jack Knife and the Queen Rose.
There will soon be many more additions to this new series! Be sure to start your collection now!
name: ES Alloy 01: GoShogun (いーえすごうきん 01 ごーしょうぐん)

subtitle: Build up an all new alloy series!
description: The all new alloy figure series from Art Storm, 'ES Alloy' is here! ES, or "Excellent Short" style, is a compact, deformed figure style that allows the figures to take many poses, allowing them to be displayed in various enjoyable ways!

Steel Jeeg and its support mecha Panzeroid are being released together as a single product! Many parts are loaded with joints for posability, and replacing various parts allows different weapons and forms to be taken. The Steel Jeeg can also combine with the Panzeroid to form the Centaur Form!
There will soon be many more additions to this new series, meaning even more ways of having fun are on their way!
name: ES Alloy 02: Steel Jeeg & Panzeroid (いーえすごうきん 02 こうてつじーく＆ぱーんさろいど)
copyright: © 永井豪／ダイナミック企画

subtitle: Long black hair and cat ears!♥
description: Another Nendoroid from the popular anime and manga Kodomo no Jikan, currently being serialized in Comic High. This time the Rin-loving Kuro Kagami is getting the Nendoroid treatment!

In addition to three facial expressions, Kuro also comes with additional leg parts to set her in a sitting position - ideal for use with the chair supplied in the Nendoroid Playset #01: School Life. Just like Rin, she also comes with parts to recreate the movements in ending theme 'Hanamaru Sensation'.
Mimi Usa, the last in the group of three is currently in production, so you will soon be able to pose them all dancing together!
name: Nendoroid Kuro Kagami (かがみくろ ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 私屋カヲル／こじか製作委員会

subtitle: A petite and cute race queen set!
description: The Nendoroid Petite: Vocaloid RQ Set that has been seen on the official stgt support site and blog, as well as many events, is now being released as official goods from Miku Hatsune and Studie GLAD Racing.

The three most popular Vocaloid ladies: Miku Hatsune, Rin Kagamine and Luka Megurine are all posed in the cutest ways whilst wearing racing queen outfits that are actually currently in use by racing queens. An umbrella is also included

But that's not all! A pull-back car based on the Miku GT Car that was actually used in races is also included! You can display them all together to recreate a scene from the racing tracks. The pull-back car comes in two colors - black or white. Pick whichever you'd prefer!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Vocaloid RQ Set - White ver. (ぼーかろいど RQせっと ほわいとかーらーばーじょん ねんどろいどぷち)
copyright: © CryptonFutureMedia / © Studie GLAD Racing　　　※VOCALOIDはヤマハ株式会社の登録商標です。

subtitle: As fast as a leopard, and more efficient than any machine - figma Canaan.
description: From the anime 'CANAAN' comes a figma of the series' main character - Canaan herself.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for posable areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Multiple hand parts are included, such as hands that allow her to wield her gun, or hold onto her favorite sugar sticks, as well as many more.
Three expressions are included: a 'normal' face, a 'smiling' face, as well as an 'angered' face that she shows during synesthesia.
The included pistol is fitted with a sliding mechanism to recreate the scenes when Canaan reloads her weapon.
Additional parts are included and can be attached to the pistol to give the effect of a firing pistol.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Canaan (かなん ふぃぐま)

subtitle: The virtual wonder, brought to life.
description: The popular 'Character Vocal Series 1: Miku Hatsune' is back in a beautiful 1/7th scale PVC figure from Max Factory, this time sculpted in the exact pose of the original illustration used on the packaging of the Vocaloid software.

Careful attention has been given to the smallest of details such as the wrinkles in her outfit, and accurately capturing her cute expression. Her characteristic hair style, forearm sleeves and a part of her skirt make use of a transparent plastic, making a figure fit for the world-wide renown virtual idol!
name: Miku Hatsune (はつねみく)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED

subtitle: Dancing in time to the music! ♪
description: Usavich is the story that follows the carefree life of rabbits that are imprisoned in a Russian prison. The third season DVDs of the popular series have recently been released, and now Putin and Kirenenko are on their way to becoming figures - and not just any figures, huge 400mm moving figures!

Purin is sculpted dancing, swinging his hips to the music, while Kirenenko is cleaning his shoes - both to the familiar background music from the show. You will remember the comical scenes from the show just by looking at the figures!
name: Dancing Putin (だんしんぐぷーちん)

subtitle: Two rabbits to join you in the bathroom!
description: Usavich is the story that follows the carefree life of rabbits that are imprisoned in a Russian prison, and from that series comes the two main characters 'Putin' and 'Kirenenko' as pump bottles to use in your bathroom!

Putin is placed on a shampoo bottle, and Kirenenko is placed on a rinse bottle, both there to make your daily bathroom time more enjoyable! The bottles are also eco-friendly, designed to be reused multiple times.
name: Shampoo Bottle Putin (しゃんぷーぼとる ぷーちん)

subtitle: Changing colors in a strangely cute way.
description: The characters from Usavich, a story that follows the carefree life of rabbits that are imprisoned in a Russian prison, have been made into mascots that change color based on the temperature around them.

By placing Putin in water he will become paler, Leningrad will turn purple, and Komanech's and his mother will blush, and get a darker beard. Place them wherever there is water to be found, and have fun!
name: Usavich Color-Changing Mascots (4 Variations) (いろへんかますこっと（ぷーちん れにんぐらーど こまねち こまねちはは（ちち））)

subtitle:
More options, more ways to play!
A simple, convenient display case!
description: di:stage is here with its second extension set to further improve the playability of the figma range of action figures. This time introducing a simple to build, yet easy to expand, clear case display unit!
By combining this extension set with other basic sets and layer sets, you can create a display case perfect for your own figma's needs!
* Product images include pictures that contain multiple basic and layer sets. * No actual figma action figures are included in this set.
features: Four clear panels that can connect to the base unit, as well as a clear top panel are included.
By replacing the top panel with a base unit, you can build a vertical display case.
A single di:stage - Basic Set: Clear ver. is included.
name: di:stage: Extension Set 02: Clear Case Set (でぃすてーじ えくすてんしょんせっと02 くりあけーすゆにっと)

subtitle: Floating lights for the bath.
description: Usavich is a story that follows the carefree life of rabbits that are imprisoned in a Russian prison, and from that series comes a set of mascot characters that can float on water, playing a melody and showing a display of lights. The characters available are Leningrad, Komanech, Komanech's mother and the Chick Brigade.
By switching the lights off as you bath, you can create a new fantastical world!
name: Usavich Sound Lights (4 Variations) (さうんどらいと（れにんぐらーど こまねち こまねちはは（ちち） ひよこぐんだん）)

Her favorite food - sticks of sugar, as well the backpack she keeps her weapons in are both included as optional accessories, as well as her trusty gun which can be held with both hands to recreate her signature action pose. Three expressions are included - a rather distant expression suited to the quiet Canaan, an expression aroused by the excitement of battle around her, as well as a the feminine smile she always gave her friend Maria.

subtitle: Even more ways to have fun starts here, with ex:ride!
description: Vehicles that can be ridden by the figma series of figures are on their way brought to you by FREEing. The first in the new 'ex:ride' series, are a set of Italian-style vintage bikes. There are a total of five colors to choose from - pearl white, metallic red, metallic green, metallic yellow and metallic blue, so you can pick whichever suits your figma the best!

What is ex:ride? ex:ride is a set of vehicles created to be used by the figures in Max Factory's figma action figure series. All the vehicles in the series will have careful details on all their designs, and allows for even more possibilities from the figma world. Many more vehicles are scheduled to be announced soon!

subtitle:
"MAKE YOUR DREAM GARAGE."
The first in the GSR Car series is Le Man's ultimate GT machine!
description: Pre-orders will be taken at Tokimeki Mall and Circle K Sunkus stores from 9AM on 8th August 2009. On the 18th of August they will be announced to the general public.

The Shelby GT500 is a special Mustang produced by Shelby America and Carroll Shelby himself - a man who has had a huge impact on automotive racing and design over his lifetime. This mini-car is a model of the Road Going GT that obtained victory in the 24 Hours of Le Mans race - a higher grade version of the GT500 that was built between the official GT350 and GT500 models.

In comparison to the original Mustang, the GT500 has a much more dynamic design. It has a noticeably more aerodynamic front, as well as a new, original hood and duck-tail construction around the rear engine also leaves a strong impression on anyone who lays eyes on the vehicle. The "Le Mans" stripes over the body and raised light on the bonnet are also a show that this is no ordinary car.

Equipped with a 428 cubic-inch Police Interceptor engine, and with a 428 cubic-inch Cobra Jet V8 rated at 335 horsepower which it inherited from the Ford GT40 before it - however, due to it's different engine, the GT500 was still considerably different to the GT40. The torque it could create from the low level of revolutions in the engine, allowed for a much more comfortable and controllable ride. Currently, the new model of the GT500 is still able to boast excellent performance - including cruise control for today's busy roads. The new model also comes with the choice of a 4-speed manual, or 3-speed automatic transmission.
The final 'true' Shelby model

The GT500 model was manufactured at the Shelby America factory on the west coast. As the 1968 model was actually manufactured by Ford, the 'true' last Shelby was the 1967 model. The Shelby GT500 is the American model of superior, powerful driving. It was created with a chassis fine-tuned to race on any racing circuit, with rear tires always equipped with LSDs, and adjustable shock absorbers. Even the gear box was faster handling than the standard Mustang. It was a car that boasted performance, style, and a wonderfully unique appearance. Additionally, the car became famous when it debuted as 'Eleanor' in the movie 'Gone in Sixty Seconds', starring Nicolas Cage.

The GSR American Muscle series is here to release high quality models of a number of the most famous American cars. Coming up in the line up is the 1970 Dodge Challenger, the 1969 Chevrolet Corvette, the 1965 Shelby AC Cobra 427, the 1971 Mustang Mach 1, the 1969 Chevrolet Camaro Z28 and many more to look forward to.
name: GSR Cars: American Muscle Series 01 - 1967 Shelby GT500 (GSRかーず・あめりかんまっする・しりーず01／1967しぇるびーGT500)
copyright:
© "SHELBY(R) GT-500(R) are registered trademarks and/or intellectual property of Carroll Shelby and Carroll Shelby Licensing Inc. and are used under license."
SHELBY(R) GT-500(R)

subtitle: The Legendary Shelby with an incredible top speed of 272km/h!
description: Pre-orders will be taken at Tokimeki Mall and Circle K Sunkus stores from 9AM on 8th August 2009.

This is one legendary vehicle that should excite anyone in the racing field - the 'Super Snake' is a special model of the GT500 that was unparalleled. Loaded with the 7.0 LC (427ci) engine unit used on the Ford GT40 Mk.II developed by Le Mans, it is a perfect racing replica. The Super Snake was announced at a test course with a large media presence, where Caroll Shelby himself raced the car to it's top speed of 170 mph (272km/h), with an average speed of 142mph (227km/h), and created a day to remember for all racing fans.

Using a narrow-wide-narrow white stripe pattern, 10-spoke aluminum wheels, lights on both sides of the bonnet, and the well known 'Wimbledon White' body color, the external appearance of the Super Snake is not all that different to the original GT500, but the small changes alone are enough to recognize the famous car for what it is - the car that showed the world the potential the GT500 held. Only one Super Snake was ever produced, making it a vehicle that can boast both power and rarity; and a gem in both Shelby and American car history.

The GSR American Muscle series is here to release high quality models of a number of the most famous American cars. Coming up in the line up is the 1970 Dodge Challenger, the 1969 Chevrolet Corvette, the 1965 Shelby AC Cobra 427, the 1971 Mustang Mach 1, the 1969 Chevrolet Camaro Z28 and many more to look forward to.
name: 1967 Shelby Super Snake (Circle K Sunkus Limited Edition Model) (1967しぇるびー・すーぱーすねーく（さーくるけーさんくすげんていもでる）)
copyright:
© "SHELBY(R) GT-500(R) are registered trademarks and/or intellectual property of Carroll Shelby and Carroll Shelby Licensing Inc. and are used under license."
SHELBY(R) GT-500(R)

subtitle: The beginning of a new age of action figures - 'actsta'. Stand by, ready!
description: From the tremendously popular anime series Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS, Subaru Nakajima is here as the first figure to join the new set of action figures called 'actsta'.

Based off a garage kit designed by Liquid Stone, the sculpting and color have been polished to perfection, and she is capable of taking an uncountable number of poses including many of her "Shooting Arts" hand-to-hand combat techniques.

The joint areas look more natural than ever before, adding even more quality to the figure. Not to mention that the face parts, arm parts and shoes can all be exchanged with additional parts, giving even more variability to Subaru's poses.
actsta is a new action figure series brought to you from Good Smile Company, designed to focus on both mobility and superior sculpting.
Combining these two ideas, Good Smile Company is aiming for an all new action figure series. Be sure to give them a try with your own two hands!
features: act - able to actively move around, and act out various scenes.
sta - a statue that maintains a high quality image.
name: actsta: Subaru Nakajima (あくすた すばる・なかじま)
sculptor: Good Smile Company and Liquid Stone

description: With many awards including an Academy Award, the clay animation series 'Wallace and Gromit' is coming back to Japan in Summer 2009 with the Japanese version of 'A Matter Of Loaf And Death' - and these rubber key holders are based on the movie!

There are three different key holders, including Wallace and Gromit as bakers, Gromit busy cooking, and Gromit sitting on the sofa with Fluffles cuddling up close. The heart-warming items are filled with baking, love and friendship - creating a rather odd mix, but definitely one you can keep close to always be reminded of Wallace and Gromit's rather odd adventures!

The younger of the twins, Kanade Sakurai, is the more mature, reliable sister. Her long black hair is tied up behind her giving her a more tomboyish feeling. subtitle: huke and Ordet are expanding the world of BLACK ROCK SHOOTER.
description: A pilot version of the anime adaption of BLACK ROCK SHOOTER, established by the meeting of the original illustrator huke and Ordet staff, is on its way to your screens!

The pilot DVD will be released with the new CD produced by ryo, 'Miku Hatsune voice-B', and will also come with an image board booklet. The CD will also be a special edition produced just for the project announcement.
Media Contents

(DVD/BD) BLACK ROCK SHOOTER - Pilot Animation -(original/Instrumental) BLACK ROCK SHOOTER - Pilot Animation -(2M MIX/Miku Hatsune voice-β) BLACK ROCK SHOOTER - Pilot Animation -(2M MIX/Instrumental) (CD) M-1. BLACK ROCK SHOOTER 2M MIX M-2. BLACK ROCK SHOOTER 2M MIX -Instrumental-
name: BLACK ROCK SHOOTER -PILOT Edition- (ぶらっくろっくしゅーたー ぱいろっとえでぃしょん)
copyright: © huke / B★RS Project　　　※画像はジャケットイメージとなります。

subtitle: A small body, but a huge scale!
description: The long awaited ending of the OVA series 'Kodomo no Jikan: 2nd Semester' releases on the 24th of July, and to commemorate comes a figure of the adorable girl who is helplessly in love with Rin, Kuro Kagami - also here in her gym uniform.

The uniform is once again made of real fabric, giving a realistic feeling to the figure. Her long, beautiful black hair flows down onto the ground as she sits posed on the ground, with her childish expression masking her composed personality.
Mimi Usa is also planned for release shortly, so you will be able to display all the girls together!
name: Kuro Kagami: Gym Uniform ver. (かがみくろ たいそうふくばーじょん)
copyright: © 私屋カヲル/こじか製作委員会

subtitle: I'm not cute!
description: Recently broadcast on Niconico Douga, TV Kanagawa and Kids Station, and with a second series on the way, 'Tentai Senshi Sunred' is a comedy anime holds large popularity with the people of Kanagawa City and the users of Niconico Douga. Usakottsu, the mysterious stuffed bunny and part of the evil organization Florsheim, and is on his way to becoming a Nendoroid!

His arms can be replaced to recreate his ultimate move, 'Demon Claw', as well as hold various items from the show. His legs can also be replaced to place him in a sitting position. Stickers of sweat drops are included to help recreate your favorite scenes from the show!
name: Nendoroid Usakottsu (うさこっつ ねんどろいど)
copyright: ©　くぼたまこと / スクウェアエニックス・フライングドッグ

subtitle: Seven circular charms using seven different colors.♪
description: The 'Manmaru Hachune' charm collection based on 'Character Vocal Series 01: Miku Hatsune' was originally only sold at events, but is now back with three new designs - adding up to a total of seven designs and ready to be released all over!

Each charm is a perfectly rounded circle, but each type has a different expression for you to pick which suits you. Pick just one that suits your mood, or display them all together - the choice is up to you!
*This is a package of all seven charms in a box, however the box is not shown in the product images.
name: Character Charm Collection: Manmaru Hachune - Doremifasolati Set (きゃらくたーちゃーむこれくしょん まんまるはちゅね どれみふぁそらしせっと)
copyright: © おんたま／Crypton Future Media, Inc.

subtitle: The small and cute, albeit slightly strange characters
description: Currently being serialized in Dengeki Daimaou is a spin-off to the popular IDOLM@STER series called 'Puchimasu', or 'PETIT IDOLM@STER' - and from that series comes these rubber charms of the mysterious, yet cute characters from the series.

Each character is represented exactly how they would appear in a pose that relates to each of them, and each has a speech-bubble exclaiming their characteristic shouts. It allows you to be with your favorite character from the series all the time.
The characters not released in Stage 01, are all planned to be included in the Stage 02. Collect them all and enjoy the mysterious life behind the bizarre creatures.
name: PETIT IDOLM@STER - Trading Rubber Charms: Stage 01 (とれーでぃんぐらばーすとらっぷ ぷちます！すてーじ01)
copyright: © 窪岡俊之 © NBGI　　※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: The second Guardian Knight. The Healing Wind.
description: Following Signum from 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS' comes a figma of one of the Wolkenritter leaders, Shamal.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used around moveable areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Two gentle expressions that represent Shamal's affectionate personality are included.
"The Blessed Wind" Reinforce Zwei is included at the same scale as the figmas.
Additional parts for "Hayate Yagami: Knight Armour ver. " are included to recreate the union between Reinforce and Hayate.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Shamal: Knight ver. (ふぃぐま しゃまる きしふくver. )
copyright: © なのはStrikerS PROJECT © NANOHA StrikerS PROJECT

subtitle: Expand more; play more - The first expansion set is for differences in height and mobility.
description: In order to increase the enjoyment of the figma action figure series, this new generation display unit known as the 'di:stage' has been created. Combining this expansion set with the basic set allows various new ways for the di:stage to expand!. This 'Layer Unit' expansion set allows for a multilateral display area to be created, and will be sold together with the basic set. [ul]
features: Using the pillar supports allows you to display figures at various heights.
A 'swing joint' can be used to create a multilateral display space by connecting two bases that share the same raised point.
Combine it with the Basic Set and create your very own diplay space!
name: di:stage: Expansion Set 01: Layer Unit Black ver. (でぃすてーじ えくすてんしょんせっと01 れいやーゆにっと ぶらっくばーじょん)

subtitle: Expand more; play more - the new generation display base 'di:stage' is back with an alternate 'Clear' version.
description: In order to increase the enjoyment of the figma action figure series, this new generation display unit known as the 'di:stage' has been created. It will soon expand into a series with nearly infinite possibilities, but this is the basic foundation set.
** The examples of the built set in the included images includes multiple basic sets. ** The actual figma models, as well as speech bubbles are not included with this product.
features: The base unit is a 10cm square, and the perfect way to display two figmas together.
Multiple base units can be connected horizontally via flat joints, or vertically via wall joints, allowing the stage to expand however you want it to.
A grappling unit that can be used to hold virtually any action figure is included.
Effect clips can be used to hold speech bubbles and show emotions of the characters.

Using the 'binders' that can be attached to all sides of the base, you can create a background using paper vignettes, or cover the base with a cover skin. This allows you to recreate various situations to enjoy. Paper vignettes and cover skins will be available for download online, and are planned to be available in magazines.
You can combine this with future extention sets to create your very own scenarios.
name: di:stage: Basic Set Clear ver. (でぃすてーじ べーしっくせっと くりあばーじょん)

subtitle: The "Sword Cross" wielded by the last king of the night sky.
description: The second in the Lyrical Nanoha metal charm series, Hayate Yagami's staff, the Schwertkreuz, is rendered here in exquisite detail. The complexity of the unique staff's cross-shaped head remains intact, as does the design of the included magic circle, making it the perfect addition to any fan's collection.
name: Device Metal Charm Collection 02 - Schwertkreuz (しゅべるとくろいつ でばいすめたるちゃーむ これくしょん)

subtitle: Expand more; play more - A clear version of the first expansion set, for differences in height and mobility.
description: In order to increase the enjoyment of the figma action figure series, this new generation display unit known as the 'di:stage' has been created. Combining this expansion set with the basic set allows various new ways for the di:stage to expand!. This 'Layer Unit' expansion set allows for a multilateral display area to be created, and will be sold together with the basic set. [ul]
features: Using the pillar parts you can create differences in height allowing you to display figures at various heights.
A 'swing joint' can be used to create a multilateral display space by connecting two bases that share the same raised point.
Combine it with the Basic Set and create your very own diplay space!
name: di:stage: Expansion Set 01: Layer Unit Clear ver. (でぃすてーじ えくすてんしょんせっと01 れいやーゆにっと くりあばーじょん)

subtitle: Seven circular charms using seven different colors.♪
description: The 'Manmaru Hachune' charm collection based on 'Character Vocal Series 01: Miku Hatsune' was originally only sold at events, but is now back with three new designs - adding up to a total of seven designs and ready to be released all over!

Each charm is a perfectly rounded circle, but each type has a different expression for you to pick which suits you. Pick just one that suits your mood, or display them all together - the choice is up to you!
Each of the versions (do, re, mi, fa, sol, ra and ti) are each sold separately.
name: Character Charm Collection: Manmaru Hachune (きゃらくたーちゃーむこれくしょん まんまるはちゅね)
copyright: © おんたま／Crypton Future Media, Inc.

subtitle: The reborn who kepps the Sacred God's name close by.
description: From 'Seinarukana' the second chapter in the popular PC game series 'Eien Shinken Monogatari' comes a PVC figure of the game's heroine, Satsuki Ikaruga. The figure was originally designed as a garage kit by the popular sculpting group Cerberus Project, but is now being released as a finished product by Lilics.

With a charming, yet focused expression, she stands gallantly brandishing her Eternity Sword, 'Kougi', just as a true leader should appear before her followers. Her flowing hair and costume sway graciously in the wind, as she strikes down her enemies in the heat of battle.
name: Satsuki Ikaruga (いかるがさつき)

subtitle: Piling up the enemies as they fall by her hand.
description: From the popular PC Game 'Koihime Musou' that has recently had its second anime series announced, comes a PVC figure of Kanu, the warrior who fights to defend the safety of the public.

Holding her favorite weapon, 'Seiryuu Engetsudou' in one hand, she has been posed in a vibrant, dynamic pose, as if she was attacking an enemy camp. Her serious and loyal personality is displayed through her gallant facial expression, as her long black hair flows behind her.
She comes complete with a base of flames, creating a figure that is definitely a sight to behold.
name: Aisha Kanu (かんう あいしゃ)

subtitle: Nanoha's lovely staff, which starts the story off!
description: With its pulse-pounding action and lovable characters, Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS has made quite a name for itself, and now the faithful Raising Heart Excelion, which has fought with Nanoha from the very beginning, makes an appearance as a metallic charm courtesy of Good Smile. In its combat-ready Buster Mode, the staff contains a transparent rhinestone at its centre, includes a detailed rendition of Nanoha's magic seal, and is perfect either to wear or to display. Certainly, any Nanoha fan will drool at the prospect of owning this wonderful charm.
name: Metal Device Charm Collection 01: Raising Heart Excelion (でばいすちゃーむ これくしょん 01 れいじんぐはーとえくせりおん ばすたーもーど)

subtitle: The naïve king of the three kingdoms. figma Sonsaku Hakufu!
description: From Ikkitousen Great Guardians comes a figma of the leader of Nanyang Academy - Sonsaku Hakufu in her school uniform.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used around the shoulders and skirt, as well as parts of the hair, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Replaceable clothes allow you to recreate Sonaku as if she was in a battle, wearing a ripped uniform.
A shouting face, as well as an expression as if she was possessed by the dragon that sleeps within her are both included, giving a total of 3 expressions.
There are five replaceable hand parts for both the left and right hands, including hand-to-hand combat hands suited perfectly to Sonsaku.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Sonsaku Hakufu (そんさくはくふ ふぃぐま)

subtitle: The reborn Otoha Karas!
description: From the 40 year commemoration anime from Tatsunoko Production, 'Karas' comes a limited edition PVC figure of Otoha Karas in his 'Regenerated Karas' form. The figure has been brought to life by the popular sculptor Kenji Andou, who was also responsible for the character designs for many of the monsters as well as Eko Karas in the series!

Using a soft material for the bulk of the figure allows it to keep to it's true design, whilst still creating a great action figure that can easily pose in a number of ways. Multiple hand replacements are also included, along with his sword both before and after it's change, allowing for even more scenes from the show to become a reality!
name: S.O.G MAX Otoha Karas: Regenerate Ver. (えす おー じー まっくす おとはからす りじぇねらーとばーじょん)
copyright: © タツノコプロ／鴉 -KARAS- 製作委員会

subtitle: Hawk One, take off!
description: From the classic Ultra Seven anime series comes an EX Alloy model of the Ultra Hawk Number One - the aircraft developed in the Ultra Garrison's East Base to be their most powerful military weapon.

Sculpted by the popular Shouichi Manabe, this model's wings span an impressive 38cm, and the main body as well as the wings have been sculpted via die casting, giving the model both a realistic feel and a realistic weight. All three parts of the aircraft, the α,β and γ parts can be connected and separated via magnets, and each has their own stand, allowing you to display them in Formation Attack mode as well.
name: EX Alloy: Ultra Hawk Number One (えくすごうきん うるとらほーくいちごう)

subtitle: The dark watchmen, Karas!!
description: From Tatsunoko Production's 40 year aniversary OVA 'Karas', comes a figure of the main character from the show, 'Otoha Karas', who threw away his individuality to protect the city. The design of the figure has been created by the popular designer of the Eko Karas, Kenji Ando.

Flexible materials have been used all over the body, creating a very poseable action figure that never loses its style. The Karas sword in both its original version and expanded version are inlcluded, as well as exchangeable face parts and an abundance of replaceable hand parts.
The ability to recreate scenes from the anime has never been this easy!
name: S.O.G. Max Otoha Karas (えす おー じー まっくす おとはからす)
copyright: © タツノコプロ／鴉 -KARAS- 製作委員会

subtitle: Military cosplay from the Sengoku era!
description: The miniature charm sets that are even smaller than the normal Nendoroid Petite figures are back in animate and Gamers stores again! A separate set of each of the three heroines of Lucky Star will each be sold in various areas around Japan - each cosplaying famous commanders from that area.

Wearing the characteristic armor or clothing of various different commanders, the Lucky Star girls make a total of 18 mascots, and each of these mascots are sold as both a netsuke and a miniature charm.
Additionally, an extra charm of Miyuki Takara is included in the full set available through mail order.
name: Nendoroid PLUS: Lucky Star Cosplay Charm Series 2 (らきすた こすぷれねづけ＆ちゃーむだい２だん ねんどろいどぷらす)
copyright: © 美水かがみ／らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: The most ferocious mad scientist around!
description: From flash animator FROGMAN's masterpiece work "Eagle Talon", comes a Nendoroid of the scientist from Edo Tokyo, Professor Leonardo. His face and arm parts can be replaced to recreate his signature pose "Falcon Claw!"
His favorite foods: honey, fish and pizza are all included as optional extras, and various parts of the figure are poseable - so strike a pose you like and display it for all to see!
name: Nendoroid Professor Leonardo (れおなるどはかせ ねんどろいど)

subtitle: A man's world that anyone would yearn for. Even better with a di:stage included!
description: From 'Golgo 13', a manga and anime series that began back in the 1960s, comes a figma of the professional assassin, Duke Togo.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for the suit, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Poses of him aiming his rifle can easily be taken using the joints placed in the neck.
Two weapons are included - the well-known M16 as well as the 38-caliber revolver. The M16 can also be separated and stored in the included attache case.
In addition to the normal face, a grinning face with clenched teeth is included.
Various hand parts are included, including a hand to hold his cigar, as well as hands to hold his weapons in various ways.

In addition to the normal figma stand, the new generation display base 'di:stage: Basic Set' will be sold together with Golgo 13. A paper vignette in the image of a motel and speech bubbles are also included to really recreate the unique world of Golgo 13.
name: figma Golgo 13 (ごるごさーてぃん ふぃぐま)
copyright: © さいとう・たかを／さいとう・プロ／リイド社

subtitle: Repent for just 100yen, it's Zange-chan!
description: Following in her sister's footsteps, the beautiful Zange-chan from the popular "Kannagi", is also on her way as a 1/8 scale PVC figure. Also a goddess, Zange-chan inhabits the body of the shy Hakua Suzushiro, and even has a fanclub created around her as a 'local idol'.

Similar to Nagi, Zange-chan has been sculpted using the illustration from the front cover of the second volume of the manga as a basis. As she stares up from her seated pose, her beautiful legs and charming stare are bound to mezmerize whoever gazes in her direction.
name: Zange-chan (ざんげちゃん)

subtitle: Two adorable heroines as 1/24th scale decals.
description: Nitroplus' popular game 'Demonbane' has made its way to join the GSR Character Customize Series!

Decals focusing on two of the heroines - the original Necronomicon 'Al Azif' and the mysterious girl 'Another Blood' - as well as various symbols and signs from the Demonbane are all included. Additionally, the 'Nendoroid' logo and 'Nitroplus 10th Anniversary' logo are included as extra decals, allowing for even more fun, and the perfect decoration of any plastic model.
The decals make use of a high quality material, that does not allow the colors to fade easily.
name: GSR Character Customize Series 06: Demonbane - 1/24th Scale Decals (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ きゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる06／きしんひしょうでもんべいん)

subtitle: The Flame-Haired Red-Eyes Customization. Decals for 1/24th scale use.
description: The popular series 'Shakugan no Shana' has joined the GSR Character Customize Series!

Focusing on the crimson haired heroine, 'Shana', various decals making use of flames, symbols from the anime's world are all included allowing you to give an air of Shana's world to any plastic model - or anything else you want to use them on. Various extra decals such as the 'figma' and 'Nendoroid' logos are also included as extras.
The decals make use of a high quality material, that does not allow the colors to fade easily.
name: GSR Character Customize Series 05: Shakugan no Shana II - 1/24th Scale Decals (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ きゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる05／しゃくがんのしゃな2)
copyright: ©高橋弥七郎/いとうのいぢ/アスキー・メディアワークス/『灼眼のシャナⅡ』製作委員会・MBS

subtitle: Back again in her summer uniform!!!
description: Konata Izumi from the popular 'Lucky Star' series is here once again, this time wearing her summer uniform!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for the uniform and skirt, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Various hand parts are included, also with all new hands such as a hand for holding items and the 'thumbs-up' hand.

A "＝ω＝" expression ideal for Konata is included, as well as the expression from the opening theme when she shouts 'dadada'. A blank face with stickers is also included for you to make your own expression.
A head part for Konata's younger cousin Yutaka Kobayakawa is included, as well as a bag to carry all Konata's otaku purchases.
As always, all the face parts can be used with all the previous Lucky Star figmas.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Konata Izumi: Summer Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま いずみこなた なつふくver.)
copyright: ©  美水かがみ/らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: figma Billy Herrington - perfect posing, of course.
description: Now available for pre-order from NicoNico Chyokuhan! (http:niconico.qt.shopserve.jp/)

That body... that appearance... they truly are mystical. The well-known idol from NicoNico Douga, the "underwear wresting aniki", Billy Herrington is back with a special 'Birthday ver.' to coincide with his birthday!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various wrestling scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for his breast muscles and biceps, allowing the proportions of his beautiful body to be kept, without compromising the posability.
The first figma to bare his naked body, allowing for even more thriving poses!
This new version includes a bondage costume to add yet another side to Billy's figma.

His underwear is identical to that which appeared in his videos, and there are two variations to switch between, or worn together at the same time. A skin-colored pair is also included for an even more naked appearance.
A locker room paper craft are also included, allowing you to produce the true gay palace, and act out even more situations.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Billy Herrington: Birthday ver. (ふぃぐま びりー・へりんとん ばーすでーver. )
