** The examples of the built set in the included images includes multiple basic sets. ** The actual figma models, as well as speech bubbles are not included with this product.
features: The base unit is a 10cm square, and the perfect way to display two figmas together.
Multiple base units can be connected horizontally via flat joints, or vertically via wall joints, allowing the stage to expand however you want it to.
A grappling unit that can be used to hold virtually any action figure is included.
Effect clips can be used to hold speech bubbles and show emotions of the characters.

Using the 'binders' that can be attached to all sides of the base, you can create a background using paper vignettes, or cover the base with a cover skin. This allows you to recreate various situations to enjoy. Paper vignettes and cover skins will be available for download online, and are planned to be available in magazines.
You can combine this with future extention sets to create your very own scenarios.
name: di:stage: Basic Set (でぃすてーじ べーしっくせっと)

subtitle: A special version of the cute electronic songstress.
description: From the ever-popular "Character Vocal Series 01: Miku Hatsune" comes this 1/8 scale PVC figure of Miku Hatsune that featured in a commercial for Good Smile Company. In this special version, Miku has her eyes closed, enthralled by the 'First Morning' commercial - and with the altered expression, she has an all new calming feel to her.
The new Miku will be sold at a special price to thank everyone who has been enjoying the Miku Hatsune series of figures!
name: Miku Hatsune: Commercial ver. (はつねみく しーえむばーじょん)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED　※写真は試作品です。実際の商品とは若干異なる場合がございます。ご了承ください。

subtitle: figma Miku has changed her setup and is back again for a limited edition WonderFest release!
description: This time around she comes complete with a di:stage set that closely resembles a live stage! She comes with a normal facial expression as well as a new expression showing her singing with closed eyes. A full keyboard set is also included, as well as a rather different facial part.

Additionally, her outfit is coated with a more metallic paint, giving her a glittering appearance as she appears on stage for her fans. If you are joining the festivities at the WonderFest be sure to grab one!
name: figma Miku Hatsune: Live Stage ver. (ふぃぐま はつねみく らいぶすてーじver.)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED　※写真は試作品です。実際の商品とは若干異なる場合がございます。ご了承ください。

subtitle: The rosary's seal has been released.
description: From the popular anime Rosario and Vampire (also being serialized in JUMP SQ) comes a PVC figure of the vampire heroine of the show, Moka Akashiya, in her awakened state. It's the very first figure of Moka's dark side!

The position and costume used for the figure is based on the cover image of the third volume of the Rosario and Vampire manga. She is grasping her rosary in one hand with a sly smile, presenting a beautiful yet mysterious charm. Her long legs stretch out from her mini-skirt are given double the charm by the mirror based stand that she sits upon, and are bound to entrance anyone with their beauty. The chain is made from metal, allowing for a different feel to the normal PVC and ABS figures.
name: Moka Akashiya Awakened ver. (あかしや もか ばんぱいあかくせいごばーじょん)
copyright: © 池田　晃久/集英社・陽海学園新聞部

subtitle: Do not dishonor mankind!!
description: From the popular PC game Muv-Luv Alternative, comes a figma of Meiya Mitsurugi in her UN Army armour!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
Her characteristic armour has been faithfully recreated to match the original, with various areas make use of a flexible plastic allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
'Minarukamui', her symbolic sword is included, and can be sheathed and removed from her scabbard.
Other than her default expression, an additional shouting expression is included to recreate Meiya's gallant fighing image.
Hand parts allowing her to weild her sword are included, as well as various other hand parts, coming to a total of four hand parts for each hand.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Meiya Mitsurugi: UN Troop ver. (ふぃぐま みつるぎめいや 99しきえいしきょうかそうび こくれんぐんせいきへいver.)

subtitle: The guardian knight clad in flames.
description: From Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS comes a figma of one of Hayate Yagami's knights and the leader of the Wolkenritter, Signum!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used around moveable areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.

Her armed device, Laevatein comes in 3 different forms. 'Schwertform', a sword surrounded in flames, 'Schlangenform', a whip form in which each piece is connected by a wire for posability, and 'Bogenform' as a longbow.
Two face parts that both represent Signum's loyal personality are included.
Hands used to hold onto specific parts of the weapons, hold the arrows or scabbard are all included, allowing for more gallant poses.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Signum: Knight ver. ( ふぃぐま しぐなむ きしふくver.)
copyright: © なのはStrikerS PROJECT © NANOHA StrikerS PROJECT

subtitle: The obstinate princess is just as arrogant as a Nendoroid.
description: Prism Ark started off as just a game, but was soon converted into an anime and various other formats - and now the tsundere princess Priecia is on her way to being a Nendoroid!

Various scenes can be recreated with Priecia's Nendoroid - from her flashy action poses to her most adorable expressions. The cute sculpting of the Nendoroid series remains as always, but this time the fine details on her ornate ornaments, as well as her vivid coloring cause her to draw attention to any figure collection. The miniature Kagura that featured in the official illustration is also included.
name: Nendoroid Priecia (ぷりーしあ ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 2007 PENCIL・G-1 NEO/プリズム・アーク製作委員会

subtitle: The heart-warming idol.
description: Following Nagi from the popular anime "Kannagi" comes a Nendoroid of Zange-chan! Yet another goddess, but this time the one who possessed the shy Hakua Suzushiro.

Two replaceable face parts are included, one to bring out Zange-chan's malicious expression, and another one for her 'blank' expression. It also wouldn't be Zange-chan without her 'One Time for 100 Yen' sign, as well as two impurities that she can place in her hands. Displaying her togther with her sister will complete the twins in one of their most adorable forms yet!
name: Nendoroid Zange-chan (ざんげちゃん ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 武梨えり/一迅社･アニプレックス

subtitle: Perfect posing of a perfect body. figma Billy Herrington.
description: Now available for pre-order from NicoNico Chyokuhan! (http:niconico.qt.shopserve.jp/)
That body... that appearance... they truly are mystical. The well-known idol from NicoNico Douga, the "underwear wresting aniki", Billy Herrington has been made into his very own figma!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various wrestling scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for his breast muscles and biceps, allowing the proportions of his beautiful body to be kept, without compromising the posability.
The first figma to bare his naked body, allowing for even more thriving poses!
Barbells and dumbbells are included so Billy can keep his body in perfect shape.

His underwear is identical to that which appeared in his videos, and there are two variations to switch between, or worn together at the same time. A skin-colored pair is also included for an even more naked appearance.
A shower head and shower room paper craft are also included, allowing you to produce even more situations.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: Billy Herrington (びりー・へりんとん ふぃぐま)

subtitle: The fated sword.
description: The forth charm in the Fate/Stay Night Metal Charm collection is the Azoth sword used by Rin Tohsaka.

Both the sword itself and the gem that stored magical energy are being sold together as a single set, allowing you to fully enjoy the contrast between the dull light shining off the sword, and the deep crimson gem.
name: Fate Metal Charm Collection 04: Azoth Sword (ふぇいとめたるちゃーむこれくしょん 04 あぞっとけん)

subtitle: The cutest idols ever!
description: With the new PSP version released, the popular idol manager simulation game, THE IDOLM@STER is getting its second batch of petite Nendoroids! All the five characters (and an extra!) that were not in the first series will be released in their own cute Nendoroid forms this time around!
Just like the first set, each character has two variations of clothes - one of each wearing their idol costumes, and another of each wearing their everyday casual clothes.
Combine the two sets together and recreate any of the performances that you liked from the game!
name: Nendoroid Petite: THE IDOLM@STER - Stage 02 (あいどるますたーすてーじ02 ねんどろいど ぷち)

subtitle: Her thoughts cross over the universe!
description: From the new science fiction anime released by Sunrise this year, "Sora o Kakeru Shoujo", comes a PVC figure of the main heroine, Akiha Shishido - the perfectly normal girl with a bright, positive attitude!

She has been sculpted based on a key visual from the anime, standing in a dynamic pose fulled with energy that pulls out her personality perfectly. The Imo-chan figure that is included with the simultaneously released "Nendoroid Imoko Shishido Maidroid Ver." can be displayed together with Akiha to complete the rendition of the duo.
name: Akiha Shishido (ししどうあきは)
copyright: © サンライズ・バンダイビジュアル

subtitle: The succubus who has lived for all eternity.
description: The Nishimura Collection continues following the popular Mai Shiranui figure released in 2007. This time it's a PVC figure of Morigan, the popular character from "Vampire Savior - The Lord of Vampire".

She has been sculpted holding her hair up while staring ahead with a compelling gaze, with a sensual pose perfectly suited to her appealing succubus body. The sculptor, Takeshi Hamasaki has given his best to sculpt this charming 1/6 scale figure for all to enjoy.
name: Nishimura Collection: Morigan (にしむらきぬこれくしょん もりがん)
series: Vampire Savior: The Lord of Vampire
copyright: © CAPCOM CO., Ltd. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

subtitle: The gentle-hearted princess who protects the forest.
description: From the maniac shooter game of long standing fame, "Mushihime-sama Futari" comes a 1/7 scale PVC figure of the deity of "Shunshu ga Mori", who is also the main character of the game, Reco!

She has an innocent smiling face suited to her personality, but in contrast are her bold, eye-catching proportions. The gentle princess will make you feel loved with this charmingly sculpted figure, positioned in a nicely balanced supple position. Her most well known feature - her long pigtails - are made from a clear plastic, but still keep a brilliantly vivid color. Careful detail has been added to areas such as her brooch and belt, making even the smallest areas a pleasure to look at.
name: Reco (れこ)

subtitle: The optimum set of cotton swabs for applying decals, or paint to models.
description: A vital set of cotton swabs consisting of three different types, 'Wet', 'Large Dry' and 'Small Dry'. The wet type is soaked in chemicals that make it very difficult to dry out - perfect for removing wrinkles, or applying decals. The large and small dry types have tipped ends, which are perfect for placing intricate parts of decals down, or removing paints from tools after use. 10 wet swabs, 40 large dry swabs and 25 small dry swabs are included, for a total of 75 swabs.

Pick the right tools for the job! High quality model construction requires high quality tools! The 'GSR Modeler Support Series' is a set of tools for model construction that has been created using both the ideas and experience of GSR's professional modelers. Defects and unreliable tools from the past have been corrected, creating easy-to-use, reliable tools of the highest quality. From beginners to experts, the GSR Modeler Support Series will cater to all!
features: Brand new wet cotton swabs included.
A lot of work went into the shape of the tips of the swabs, making them ideal for their proposed use.
A single set versatile in multiple ways.
name: MSS-03 GSR: Edged Cotton Swabs (MSS-03 GSRえっじめんぼう)

subtitle: Marudashi and Morodashi
description: From CLAMP's popular work "xxxHolic" come the blue haired Maru and the pink haired Moro - the two mysterious girls who live in Yuuko's shop, sold together as a single set. The pose was taken from an illustration seen in the first volume of the manga.

In sharp contrast to their normal personalities, the girls are posed wearing flowing kimonos in a rather erotic pose, pushing the yuri factor for this figure super high! You can even see their detailed knee socks through the opening between the kimonos!
name: Maru & Moro (まるともろ)

subtitle: The Vic Viper from Gradius II is back again, this time as Mika Akitaka's design.
description: Another addition to Atlier-Sai's popular plastic model kit series of the Vic Viper!

One of the most popular ships in the Gradius universe, the Gradius II Vic Viper is back again. This version was designed by the popular designer, Mika Akitaka. The coloring, as well as all the original decals are included with the kit, which features a green coloring different to the Dengeki Hobby Magazine Ver.
name: Vic Viper "Gradius 2" - Mika Akitaka ver. Green Color (びっくばいぱー げーむ ぐらでぃうす2 あきたかみかばーじょん ぐりーんからー)
copyright: © 2009 Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd　　　※写真は未塗装済み完成見本です。

subtitle: Thin, realistic metallic foil for adding that extra detail to your models.
description: This metallic foil is perfect for increasing the detail level on scale models, and includes the glue to apply it to models. By making use of real metal, a realistic chrome feel has been recreated. Thinner than other similar products from the past, as well as easier to stretch out - making it great for curved surfaces. The sheets are extra large allowing easily application to large areas such as car roofs. Each sheet is 150mm x 200mm.

Pick the right tools for the job! High quality model construction requires high quality tools! The 'GSR Modeler Support Series' is a set of tools for model construction that has been created using both the ideas and experience of GSR's professional modelers. Defects and unreliable tools from the past have been corrected, creating easy-to-use, reliable tools of the highest quality. From beginners to experts, the GSR Modeler Support Series will cater to all!
features: A realistic feeling that can only be produced from using real metals.
Easy to use, and a mere 10 microns in thickness. (including glue)
Can easily be applied to curved surfaces.
name: MSS-04 GSR: Chrome Master (MSS-04 くろーむますたー)

subtitle: The mole on her breast is the proof! It's Mikuru's adult form from the future!
description: From "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya", comes the beauty who has looks so stunning that anything that looks at her falls in love instantly, a figure of the adult Mikuru Asahina!

Wearing a mini-skirt, stockings, and a blouse that leaves a wide enough opening for you to enjoy all of the adult charm behind her legendary proportions. Two different facial expressions are included, as well as a replaceable right arm to recreate her "Classified Information" pose. The scene where she revealed the mole on her breast can also be recreated!
name: Mikuru Asahina Adult Ver. (あさひなみくる おとなばーじょん)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団　　　※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: A new friend to join the Nendoroids!
description: From 'Da Capo II To You' comes a Nendoroid of Otome Asakura!
name: Nendoroid Otome Asakura (ねんどろいど あさくらおとめ)

subtitle: Good wife! Dictator! Scary wife! Operation Cozy Family, Begin!!
description: The anime of "Kyouran Kazoku Nikki" has come to an end, but it still remains as popular as ever, and now a 1/8 scale PVC figure of the mother of the Midarezaki household, Kyouka, is on its way!

Kyouka stands with her cat ears and tail, looking like a young girl even though she claims to be 20 years old. Making use of her fervent character, she is placed in a pose that truly makes her look like an omnipotent deity. Two of the mini-Kyokas that bustled around in the opening theme of the series have also been included in a cute Nendoroid petite form, each with different expressions.
name: Kyouka Midarezaki & Mini-Kyoukas (みだれざききょうか＆ぷちきょうか)
copyright: © 2008 Akira／PUBLISHED BY ENTERBRAIN,INC.／超常現象対策局分室

subtitle: The kind, devoted maid is ready to serve.
description: From the new science fiction anime released by Sunrise this year, "Sora o Kakeru Shoujo", comes a Nendoroid of Akiha's Naviman, 'Imoko Shishido' in her Maidroid outfit.

It's the first Nendoroid to have an interior design! - just as it appeared in the anime, the hair can open to reveal a small opening for Imo-chan to stick her helmeted head out. Imo-chan also comes with an additional face part, as well as a body part to recreate her uniform appearance. Akiha Shishido's PVC figure will be released at the same time, allowing you to display them together.
name: Nendoroid Imoko Shishido Maidroid Ver. (ししどういもこ めいどろいどばーじょん ねんどろいど)
series: The Girl Who Leapt Through Space
copyright: © サンライズ・バンダイビジュアル

subtitle: A newly created special glue for softening and applying decals!
description: GSR's original special decal fitter is perfect for applying decals to curved, or uneven surfaces without any problems. Not only does it soften the decals, but also increases the bonding power of the, helping to prevent silvering (when parts of the decal do not stick down correctly, causing an uneven surface). They are also perfectly compatible with GSR's Edged Cotton Swabs. Each bottle contains 30ml.

Pick the right tools for the job! High quality model construction requires high quality tools! The 'GSR Modeler Support Series' is a set of tools for model construction that has been created using both the ideas and experience of GSR's professional modelers. Defects and unreliable tools from the past have been corrected, creating easy-to-use, reliable tools of the highest quality. From beginners to experts, the GSR Modeler Support Series will cater to all!
features: Softens even the thickest of decals.
An original formula for enchanced bonding.
Allows applying of decals without the mistakes.
name: MSS-02 GSR: Decal Fitter (MSS-02 GSRでかーるなんちゃくざい)

subtitle: A strong bonding liquid adhesive designed for plastic models!
description: Unlike previous adhesives, GSR's new adhesive melts plastic allowing for a powerful bond, and a much faster production time. The adhesive is impurity-free, making use of only 100% pure components, and has been placed in an airtight 100ml steel container.

Pick the right tools for the job! High quality model construction requires high quality tools! The 'GSR Modeler Support Series' is a set of tools for model construction that has been created using both the ideas and experience of GSR's professional modelers. Defects and unreliable tools from the past have been corrected, creating easy-to-use, reliable tools of the highest quality. From beginners to experts, the GSR Modeler Support Series will cater to all!
features: Powerful bonding through use of impurity-free ingredients.
A liquid type adhesive that will reliably bond any plastics.
100ml bottle
name: MSR-01 GSR: Strong Adhesive (MSS-01 GSRきょうりょくようちゃくざい)

subtitle: Even in maid uniform, she poses mega well, nyoron~
description: In episode 12 of The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi, "Live Alive" Tsuruya-san dressed in this cute maid outfit for the the café her class was running during the culture festival. Now a figma of Tsuruya-san in that cute maid uniform is on its way!
features: The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for her shoulder area, her apron and parts of her hair, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability.
Face parts to recreate the "Yuki Puppet" scene, as well as the winking pose from the opening theme are included. The faces can be exchanged with the School Uniform ver.
Various extras such as a lantern, yakisoba and a filled paper cup are all included to recreate the scenes at the festival. The hand parts for the puppet scene are also included.
As a bonus part, a new hair part for Mikuru is included, which you to attach to the original Mikuru's head parts, allowing you to create Mikuru's maid figma as well.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Tsuruya-san: Culture Festival Maid ver. (ふぃぐま つるやさん ぶんかさいめいどver.)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ／ＳＯＳ団　　　※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: Incredible technique, masked by an expressionless face.
description: The third in Max Factory's "Haruhi Suzumiya's Extravaganza" series! Finally Yuki Nagato is here to join the collection, dressed in a punk style costume whilst clinging to her guitar.

Based on the original illustration, this dynamic, open figure is topped full with Yuki's subtle charm. Everything from her boots, chain belt, guitar, the leather jacket made to feel as it should – they're all packed with secret hidden details! You can also peek at her cute belly area in between the gap of her trousers and shirt - the contrast between her clothes and skin is one of the many highlights of the figure.

Yuki was once again sculpted by Masanori Kuroda, and with her release the set of heroines has come to a close – if you display her together with the other two in the series, Mikuru Asahina and Suzumiya Haruhi, you can create a collection that truly stands out in any collection!
name: Yuki Nagato Extravaganza Ver. (ながとゆき げきそうばーじょん)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団　　　※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: Stick them wherever, decorate whatever you want! A Rin and Len Sticker Set!
description: Once again allowing you to customize your car or bike in the easiest way possible! The popular virtual idols Rin and Len Kagamine are here to join the Good Smile Racing sticker series.

The well-known official illustration is included as a massive 36cm sticker, along with 35 other smaller stickers - a huge A3 page of stickers to stick wherever you want, and decorate whatever you want!
The seals are made in Japan and make use of a high quality material, that doesn't allow the colors to fade easily.
name: GSR Character Customize Series 03: Big Sticker Set - Rin/Len Kagamine (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ きゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず びっくさいずすてっかー03／かがみねりん・れん)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

subtitle: The little cupid, perfectly poseable.♥
description: Following the "Yuki Nagato Evil Witch Ver." comes another figma from The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya Episode 0: "Mikuru Asahina's Adventures" - this time being Mikuru herself, dressed up in her Fighting Waitress uniform.
features: The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for her shoulder area, the skirt and the apron, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability.

Two face parts are included, one to recreate the Mikuru Beam scene, and the other of a winking face as if she was saying her well-known phrase "Confidential Information". The faces can be switched with both the School Uniform ver. and the Cheerleader ver.
Two model guns, and new hand parts to recreate the Mikuru Beam pose are included.
As bonus parts, a new face for the figma Kyon School Uniform ver., as well as the reindeer head that appeared in the ending theme are included.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Mikuru Asahina: Fighting Waitress ver. (ふぃぐま あさひなみくる たたかううぇいとれすver.)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ／ＳＯＳ団　　　※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: Transformed by magic, it's Kagami in Miku's outfit!
description: It's an image of Kagami that has been popular ever since the cover illustration from the Lucky Star OVA was released, and now it's coming as a Nendoroid -it's Kagami as she appeared within her dream, cosplaying as Miku Hatsune!

She comes complete with the two leeks that featured on the OVA's cover, as well as various expressions that show exactly how awkward she feels about cosplaying. She even comes with the popular expression that she made as she said, "I want to ******", as she woke from her dream.
The body of the Nendoroid is based on Kagami's body shape, and is thus a completely new mould.
name: Nendoroid MikkuMiku Kagami (みっくみくかがみ ねんどろいど)
copyright:
© 美水かがみ／らっきー☆ぱらだいす 2008
© Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

subtitle: The beautiful earth goddess.
description: From the popular anime "Kannagi" comes a nendoroid of the self-proclaimed goddess, Nagi - the guardian deity that was brought into the world through a sculpture carved from the sacred tree.

Everything from her unique costume and hairstyle have all been converted into nendoroid form, but kept true to their originals. She has various expressions that you can use to recreate all sorts of scenes with, and the magical baton she uses to cleanse the impurities of the world is also included.
name: Nendoroid Nagi (なぎ ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 武梨えり/一迅社･アニプレックス　　　※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: Perfect for customizing model cars and virtually anything else! Rin and Len as 1/10 scale stickers!
description: A two page set of 1/10 scale GSR Seals featuring the popular Rin and Len Kagamine, allowing you to customize model cars, radio-controlled cars, even computers and cellphones, or anything else you can think of!
The 'figma' and 'Nendoroid' logos are also added as extras for a more diverse selection of stickers. Now you can keep the twins on any of your personal belongings to feel closer to them all the time!
The seals are made in Japan and make use of a high quality material, that doesn't allow the colors to fade easily. They can also easily be stuck on curved surfaces.
name: GSR Character Customize Series 03: Rin/Len Kagamine - 1/10 Scale Seals (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ きゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず しーるせっと03／かがみねりん・れん)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

subtitle: An infinite number of possibilities! Stick Rin and Len wherever your heart desires!
description: The popular virtual idols Rin and Len Kagamine are finally here as vibrant, colorful 1/24th scale decals to join the GSR Character Customize Series!

In addition to an ample amount of the characters themselves, the 'figma' and 'Nendoroid' logos are also included as extras to add more diversity to the stickers - leaving no limit to what you want to do with them. A single sheet should customize a number of model cars.
The decals are made of a high quality material, that doesn't allow the colors to fade easily.
name: GSR Character Customize Series 03: Rin/Len Kagamine - 1/24 Scale Decals (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ きゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる03／かがみねりん・れん)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

subtitle: Here to deliver her heart warming touch.
description: From the heart warming RPG Shining Wind comes a nendoroid version of the dazzling sun maiden, Kureha! Her noble appearance and kind yet strong-willed personality have all been condensed into this cute nendoroid form.

She can be posed ready to fire her bow whilst gazing ahead at her target, or you can pose her drawing her spirit sword, which is easily one of the most memorable scenes from the game. Both the Yudzuka spirit sword and the Nichirin Resshin spirit sword scenes can be recreated with the included parts, so you can display her using whichever technique best suits the situation.
name: Nendoroid Kureha (くれは ねんどろいど)

subtitle: The figma has transformed too! It's a Mikkumiku collaboration!
description: Kagami appeared cosplaying as Miku Hatsune in the Lucky Star OVA, and now that cosplaying Kagami is on its way to becoming a figma!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
Two face parts are included to suit Kagami's personality - a shocked expression and an embarrassed expression. The expressions can be switched with other Lucky Star figmas.
The figure is a new sculpt to match Kagami's body shape. Parts of the body use the same metallic coloring used on the Miku Hatsune figma.
Two of the "must have" leeks are included, made to look just as they did in the OVA.
Her long pigtails are also loaded with figma joints, allowing for more dynamic poses.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Kagami Hiiragi: Cosplay ver. (ふぃぐま ひいらぎかがみ こすぷれver.)
copyright: © 美水かがみ／らっきー☆ぱらだいす 2008 © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.　　※ 画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: She may look cute... but she's actually a dangerous weapon!
description: From the popular manga currently being serialized in Weekly Shounen JUMP, “To LOVE-Ru”, comes the most revered assassin in the universe, Golden Darkness.

The figure was based on a design that was illustrated for the anime version of the series. She is posed in mid-motion whilst daintily balancing on her toes. The motion of her body, her hair, even the fine details of the creases in her clothes have been carefully sculpted. Her right arm can be replaced with a dangerous blade to better suit her assassin's nature.
She has been designed to pair up with the previously released Lala figure, so you can double the impact by displaying them together.
name: Golden Darkness (こんじきのやみ)
copyright: © 矢吹健太朗・長谷見沙貴／集英社・とらぶる製作委員会

subtitle: Even in a band she makes the perfect mascot!
description: Another figure to join Max Factory's "The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi" PVC figure series!

Following the recently announced Haruhi figure comes this Mikuru Asahina figure in a beautiful flowing dress; also based on the same promotion illustration used for the live event "The Extravaganza of Haruhi Suzumiya".

Once again sculpted by Masanori Kuroda, she is posed with a beaming smile whist happily playing her tambourine - a pose that truly makes the figure feel like Mikuru herself. She is wearing a pink dress filled with fluttering frills, which only serves to increase her cuteness even more! Every part of her costume has been carefully sculpted to bring out as much of Mikuru's charm as possible!
name: Mikuru Asahina Extravaganza Ver. (あさひなみくる げきそうばーじょん)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団　　　※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: Listen to the cries of my heart!!
description: A new release as part of Max Factory's "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" series brings us another figure of Haruhi Suzumiya - this time in a punk style outfit based off an promotion illustration used for the live event "The Extravaganza of Haruhi Suzumiya".

Masanori Kuroda, the expert sculptor who worked on the original school uniform version of Haruhi, has taken the original image and added a dynamic, liberated feeling to the figure - creating a figure just as charming as the original illustration. Her voluminous skirt as well as all the tiny frills on her costume have all had careful attention paid to the finest of details, and the elaborately designed guitar she holds is yet another highlight of the figure.
Her vibrant facial expression truly brings out the confidence that Haruhi has always held true to - bringing out a lively figure fit for this worldwide idol.
name: Haruhi Suzumiya Extravaganza Ver. (すずみやはるひ げきそうばーじょん)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団　　　※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: A wild and sexy wanderer.
description: Based on an illustration drawn by popular artist Masamune Shirow in his poster book "Wild Wet West", Cerberus Project has brought his illustration to life with this sexy figure! Every fine detail from the original illustration has been beautifully sculpted into the figure - from her proportions, her facial expression and her radiant skin to her fingertips that seem ready to fire her gun at any moment. As an additional extra, a special card of the original illustration is included.
name: JULIONA TRANS (じゅりあな とらんす)
series: Masamune Shirow Character Series Vol 1: Wild Wet West
copyright: © 士郎正宗／クロスロード

subtitle: 3cm mascots based on their respective regions!
description: animate stores across Japan have been selling the Nendoroid Petite figures from Lucky Star for some time, but now an even smaller set of mascots is here to collect! A separate set of the three heroines of Lucky Star will each be sold in the following regions: Hokkaido, the Kantou region, Akihabara, The Hokuriki/Shinetsu/Toukai region, the Kinki region and the Chuugoku/Shigoku/Kyuushuu region.

Each of the different regions have their own specific three charms - one for each of the main characters, but each time wearing cosplay outfits that represent something that relates to the area they are being sold in. Each charm is a creative rendition of your favorite characters, and if you collect them from every region there are a total of 18 mascots to collect!
The mascots will be sold as both a netsuke and a miniature charm, so you can get whichever suits you better.
name: Nendoroid PLUS: Lucky Star Cosplay Charm Series 1 (らきすた こすぷれねづけ＆ちゃーむだいいちだん ねんどろいどぷらす)
copyright: © 美水かがみ／らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: The yukata represents the very best of Japanese culture.
description: From the series which aired on the Nico Nico Anime Channel that quickly gained popularity, "Penguin Musume Heart", comes this figure of Sakura Nankyoku!

The super cute goth-loli yukata that she wore in episode 4 of the series, "Meeting Beneath the Night Sky", has been faithfully reproduced. From her long, characteristic hair flowing around her, to the detailed goth-loli yukata that truly brings out her cute appeal.
Another figure of Sakura will be released simultaneously by Alter - display them together to get twice the charm of the ever cute Penguin Musume!
name: Sakura Nankyoku Goth-Loli Yukata Ver. (なんきょくさくら ごすろりゆかたばーじょん)
copyright: © 2008 高橋てつや(秋田書店)／南極財閥

subtitle: A goddess with long, flowing hair and a beautiful tail.
description: From Spice and Wolf, the popular Dengeki Bunko novel that recently had its 2nd anime season announced, comes a PVC figure of the heroine with fox ears and a tail, Horo!

Using a key visual from the anime as a motif for the design, she has been sculpted in this pose full of abundant energy. Her head can switch between fox ears and a scarf, and her clothes can be changed from a skirt to pants. Take the "Goddess of Harvest" home with you, and display her in whatever way you think looks best!
name: Horo (ほろ)
copyright: © 支倉凍砂/アスキー・メディアワークス/「狼と香辛料」 製作委員会

subtitle: Eat. Fight. Pray.
description: From Sengoku Lance, a game from the popular Lance PC game series but set in the Sengoku era, comes a figure of Uesugi Kenshi, Japan's strongest warrior.

As the glutton she is, she holds a super sized rice ball in her hands. Her helmet and armor can both be removed and reattached, so whenever you want to you can gaze at her world class proportions that would normally never be so easily visible. The included sword can be sheathed in her scabbard.
name: Uesugi Kenshin (うえすぎけんしん)

subtitle: Her charm breaks through the heavens!
description: The recently established yet ever promising name in figures, "Gift" brings us the second figure to join their PVC range. This time it's the heroine of "Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann" - the sniper of the Gurren Brigade, Yoko!

Carefully sculpted by Takayuki Kondou from G-DOME, her well endowed proportions have been recreated in a beautiful 1/5 scale, allowing for a wonderfully realistic figure design. Her childish face yet adult appeal has been brought out for you to enjoy to the fullest!
name: Yoko (よーこ)
copyright: © GAINAX・中島かずき/アニプレックス・KDE-J・テレビ東京・電通

subtitle: She's already ready for summer! figma Haruhi Suzumiya Summer Clothes ver.
description: Everyone's super heroine Haruhi Suzumiya is back again as a figma! This time she's in her summer clothes!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
The memorable pony tail hairstyle from the anime is included, pushing the cuteness level higher than ever!
Her digital camera, "brigade leader" desk sign, and arm band that reads "Master Detective" are all included, allowing you to recreate more scenes than ever before!
A smiling face, as well as a slightly displeased face are included. The faces can be used with the School Uniform ver.
A "thumbs up" hand part is included, allowing for even more Haruhi-esque poses!
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
The first batch of figures released will include a special limited edition school bag from a selection of three colors.
name: figma Haruhi Suzumiya: Summer Uniform ver. ( ふぃぐま すずみやはるひ なつふくver.)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団　　　※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: I'll comfort you as best I can, and as cutely as possible~♥
description: The new Kodomo no Jikan OVA's release date has been confirmed, and the ever popular anime now also has a set of Nendoroid figures to collect, starting with the bold heroine, Rin Kokonoe!

Her long twin tails are equipped with joints, so you can move them to recreate the enchanting dance from the ED theme, "Hanamaru Sensation". Her rucksack can be removed and reattached, allowing for even more Nendoroid fun!
Nendoroids of both Kuro Kagami and Mimi Usa are currently in production, and once all three girls are released, they'll all be able to dance together!
name: Nendoroid Rin Kokonoe (ここのえりん ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 私屋カヲル／こじか製作委員会

subtitle: I will no longer be afriad. figma Makina Hoshimura.
description: From the anime series Shikabane Hime comes a figma of the heroine who continues to fight for revenge, Makina Hoshimura.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for her uniform and skirt, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability.
Her two sub-machine guns have been included to look exactly like they did in the anime. An armed figma for the first time!
Parts to make the machine guns appear to be firing are also included, allowing for recreations on in-action scenes.
Two facial expressions are included - a serious facial expression, as well as one with gritted teeth.
Various hand parts are included to match her expressions, or to be used to hold her weapons.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
The first batch of figures released will include a special limited edition school bag from a selection of three colors.
name: figma Makina Hoshimura (ほしむらまきな ふぃぐま)
copyright: © 赤人義一／スクウェアエニックス・屍姫製作委員会

subtitle: The mighty bride who is both cool and honest.
description: Following the release of Unity Yuno from the game created by Akifumi Ozawa, "Unity Marriage ~The Two Brides~", comes this figure of Unity Mei. Her cool personality has been faithfully represented in her facial expression, while still keeping to the bold sculpting that was used for Yuno's figure - which means they look great when displayed together. Her large coat can be removed, allowing you to fully enjoy her bodyline which is visible through her beautiful kimono.
name: Unity Mei (ゆにてぃめい)
copyright: © 2008 ユニゾンシフト / SOFTPAL Inc.

subtitle: The naturally calm Tsukasa Hiiragi, finally here as a Nendoroid!
description: Following the Nendoroids of Konata Izumi and Kagami Hiiragi comes two more Lucky Star Nendoroids of both Tsukasa Hiiragi and Miyuki Takara - finally answering the pleas of the fans!!

Tsukasa, the younger, more gentle of the Hiiragi twins, carries her well-known cell phone that featured in the series. Her natural expressions have also been sculpted to truly bring out her personality. Tsukasa comes complete with a chair, and plenty of other replaceable parts allowing for many different poses!
name: Nendoroid Tsukasa Hiiragi Normal Ver. (ひいらぎつかさ つうじょうばーじょん ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 美水かがみ／らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: Two swords, a single weapon. The swords of darkness and light, Kanshou and Bakuya.
description: Another charm to be added to the Metal Charm Collection!

The third charm to join the Fate/Stay Night charm series is the servant Archer's two named swords, "Kanshou and Bakuya", released together in a set of two. The charms have been created to have a very metallic feeling, and the colors of the two swords are heavily contrasted to create a true feeling of light and darkness.
name: Fate Metal Charm Collection 03: Kanshou and Bakuya (ふぇいとめたるちゃーむこれくしょん 03 かんしょう・ばくや)

subtitle: It's a walking embodiment of cuteness! Nendoroid Miyuki is here!
description: Following the Nendoroids of Konata Izumi and Kagami Hiiragi comes two more Lucky Star Nendoroids of both Tsukasa Hiiragi and Miyuki Takara - finally answering the pleas of the fans!!

Miyuki, the glasses girl with the most distinguished proportions, comes complete with her bag for commuting to school. Her superior proportions are even visible in this Nendoroid rendition of her! Miyuki comes complete with a chair, and plenty of other replaceable parts allowing for many different poses!
name: Nendoroid Miyuki Takara Normal Ver. (たからみゆき つうじょうばーじょん ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 美水かがみ／らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: PIXEL, MAGICAL... this is MARITAN!!!
description: From from the hugely popular "Magical Marine Pixel Maritan" currently being serialized in Arms Magazine comes this cute Nendoroid of Maritan. Following the "Hobby Channel" limited edition, comes this equally adorable standard edition.

This "Mission Complete! Battle Preparations Ver." is easily identifiable by the various attachable extras that are included with it, such as her beloved M14 Rifle, the Pixel anchor, and a scrubbing brush. If you display her together with the limited edition version, you'll really be able to get a taste of the huge weapons she keeps by her side.
name: Nendoroid Pixel Maritan: Mission Complete! Battle Preparations Ver. (ぴくせるまりたん かんりょう！せんとうじゅんびばーじょん ねんどろいど)
copyright: © ヒライユキオ／ホビージャパン

subtitle: The cute, playful goddess of victory!
description: From "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" comes figmas of both Haruhi and Mikuru wearing the cheerleading outfits they wore during the baseball game!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for her collar and skirt, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability.
A bright smiling face, as well as a determined face are both included. The heads can also be exchanged with the school uniform version.
A helmet to fit the included faces is included.
The essential cheerleader pompoms, as well as a baseball bat and a ball are all included.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Mikuru Asahina: Cheerleader ver. (ふぃぐま あさひなみくる ちあがーるver.)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団　　　※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: The crimson artist who leads the Luminous Knights.
description: The latest addition to the Shining Project! Following the release of Kureha from the game "Shining Wind", comes the main character's childhood friend, who accompanied him though his adventures: The Chevalier of the Red Rose, Seena!

Once again the priority when sculpting the figure was sticking to Tony's original illustration as faithfully as possible, hence she has been sculpted just like the illustration, sticking her hips out to the side as she gazes ahead with an innocent smile - with her emphatic body line acting as a wonderful contrast, creating an incredibly attractive figure.
name: Seena (しーな)

subtitle: Flying high as a Nendoroid!! Yoshika Miyafuji - take off!
description: While it was being broadcast it was immensely popular, and now that the DVDs have been put on sale, the Strike Witches anime stays as popular as ever. Now a Nendoroid of the main character Yoshika Miyafuji is on the way, but this time it's being sold under a new manufacturer called "Phat Company".

Not only is this Nendoroid as cute as ever, but this one has a more mechanical, firmer feel to it. Her legs and her Striker Unit can be interchanged for a varied look, and a stand to display her as if she airborne is included. Fans are also bound to be pleased with the ability to attach dog ears to her head as well as attach her cute tail.
name: Nendoroid Yoshika Miyafuji (みやふじよしか ねんどろいど)

subtitle: The self-righteous, arrogant goddess of victory!
description: From "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" comes figmas of both Haruhi and Mikuru wearing the cheerleading outfits they wore during the baseball game!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for her collar and skirt, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability.
A winking face and a smiling face exposing all her teeth are included. The heads can also be exchanged with the school uniform version.
A helmet to fit the included faces is included.
The essential cheerleader pompoms, as well as a ball and baseball glove are all included.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Haruhi Suzumiya: Cheerleader ver. ( ふぃぐま すずみやはるひ ちあがーるver.)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団　　　※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: They're back on stage, smaller than ever before!
description: The cute 'n tiny Nendoroid Petite action figures are back - but this time starting off with a whole new series of figures. Five of the beautiful idols from the simulation game "THE IDOLM@STER" are being brought to the wonderful world of Nendoroids~♪

There are two variations of each character - one of each wearing one the costumes they would use wear on stage, and another of each wearing their everyday casual clothes. The idols that are not featured in this set will, of course, be part of the next series!
Collect all the figures in the series and recreate all of your favorite performances!
name: Nendoroid Petite: THE IDOLM@STER - Stage 01 (あいどるますたー すてーじ01 ねんどろいど ぷち)

subtitle: I'm in despair! I'm in despair over this overly cute appearance!
description: From "Sayonara, Zetsubou Sensei" comes a Nendoroid of the Despair Teacher himself, Nozomu Itoshiki! He's the super negative teacher that turns his back on anything he can... but he wasn't able to turn his back on this cute Nendoroid version of himself.

He comes along wearing his characteristic Japanese style clothes, and his well-known muffler and bag are included. Both his "Despair Face" and his "Impatient Face" are included as two of the ideal expressions to complete his personality. Also, the symbolic rope to hang the poor teacher is also included... it might just increase the size of your figure display...
name: Nendoroid Nozomu Itoshiki (いとしきのぞむ ねんどろいど)
copyright:
© 久米田康治・講談社／さよなら絶望先生製作委員会
© Copyright King Record.Co..Ltd. All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: The most precious life in Meta Falss, the child who weaved the world.
description: Following the release of Ruka's figure from the popular PS2 game "Ar Tonelico 2", comes another one of the heroines, Chroche. The pose is based on an illustration showing Chroche's composed side, but with a powerful edge and a strong air of dignity. The calm feeling created by her long, voluminous hair and the feathers on her outfit is carefully balanced out by the sharp sword by her side, extending all the way down to her feet.
name: Chroche (くろーしぇ)

subtitle: Impurity is forbidden!
description: Introducing Nagi - the beautiful earth goddess from the popular anime series Kannagi. This beautiful goddess came into our world from a wooden carving made from the wood from the Kannagi tree, and now weilds a magical baton to purify all the impurities of the world.

This figure was sculpted using the illustration from the front cover of the first volume of the manga as a basis. Her eccentric clothes and baton have had incredibly careful attention paid to them, creating a gorgeously detailed figure.
name: Nagi (なぎ)

subtitle: Rider Dagger, the weapon that binds everything in its path
description: The second charm to join the "Fate/stay night" metal charm series is the weapon used by the servant Rider, the Rider Dagger.

Sculpted in its combat form, the shining dagger has been released attached to the long, winding chain seen in the series. A motif of her master's command spell is also included, all coming together as another superb charm to add to the collection.
name: Fate Metal Charm Collection 02: Rider Dagger (ふぇいとめたるちゃーむこれくしょん 02 らいだーだがー)

subtitle: Her Eyes of Death Perception staring straight ahead!
description: Answering the pleas of the fans comes a figure of Shiki Ryougi, the heroine from the movie series that is currently a huge hit in Japan, "Kara no Kyoukai"! Dressed in her signature kimono along with a leather jacket worn over the top, she wields her knife which kills anything that stands before her. With her deadly eyes fixed ahead, she raises her knife as it glints in the moonlight in this dynamically posed statue. This statue truly captures Shiki's impressive appearance, and is now ready for delivery.
name: Shiki Ryougi (りょうぎしき)
copyright: © 奈須きのこ/講談社・アニプレックス・ノーツ・ufotable

subtitle: The Muv-Luv characters as 1/24th scale decals!
description: 1/24th scale model car decals of the popular Muv-Luv characters!

At various Itasha events, the official âge itashas: the Lamborghini Gallardo and the Lancia Stratos have gained incredible popularity. Using their designs as a basis, these colorful character decals have been created.

There are many different ways to make use of them - each sheet of decals comes with various Muv-Luv images. The seals are made in Japan and make use of a high quality material, meaning the colors will not fade easily.
name: GSR Character Customize Series: Muv-Luv - 1/24 Scale Decals 02 (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ きゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる02／マブラヴ 1/24すけーるよう)

subtitle: This is where everything started! The original figma, Juohmaru!
description: Plawres Sanshiro is a manga that began in the 80's which quickly received an anime adaption. Even now it still holds popularity with its many fans, and now a figma of the PlaWrestler Juohmaru is on its way!

The figma project was originally created as a joint effort between Masaki Asai and Max Factory using these figures as concept models - and now that we have reached the first year anniversary of figma, what better a time could there be to release the two figures that started the figma legend?
features: The original concept model behind the creation of the figma series of figures.
Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
The detail and care put into the muscles is stunningly accurate, creating a figure with more body than ever before.
A flexible plastic was used between the legs, making sure that proportions were kept, without compromising the posability.
Three faces are included, including an expressionless face, and various hand parts are also included allowing for a virtually unlimited number of poses.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Juohmaru (Original Edition): JPWA Tag Tournament ver. (ふぃぐま じゅうおうまる（げんさくばん） JPWAたっぐとーなめんとver.)
copyright: © 牛次郎・神矢みのる・秋田書店2009

subtitle: Even as a nendoroid, her body is as perfect as ever!
description: A movie version of the popular mecha anime "Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann" has just opened in theaters, and coinciding with its release comes the announcement of the nendoroid version of the beautiful sniper, Yoko! She comes with various items that featured in the anime - including her huge rifle, as well as her signature sunglasses.

She also comes with additional head and hand parts, allowing for a countless number of posing possibilities. You can pose her ready to fire her rifle, or you can switch to a completely different side of Yoko, posing her in a shy, embarrassed position. This is one nendoroid that's going to bring a ton of fun along with it!
name: Nendoroid Yoko (よーこ ねんどろいど)
copyright: © GAINAX・中島かずき/アニプレックス・KDE-J・テレビ東京・電通

subtitle: High quality official Muv-Luv stickers for real cars!
description: Large stickers used for customizing cars or motorbikes. Popular characters such as Meiya Mitsurugi, Haruhi Mitsurugi, Yuuko Kouduki and Marimo Jinguuji have all had their character designs included, creating a total of 11 stickers on a single sheet.

The longest of the character stickers reaches approximately 21cm, and the Valkyrie Brigade's insignia from Muv-Luv Alternative is also included, which stretches 11cm from top to bottom. The stickers are made in Japan using a high quality material that won't fade easily!
name: GSR Character Customize Series: Muv-Luv - Big Sticker Set 02 (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ きゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず びっぐさいず すてっかー02／マブラヴ)

subtitle: Muv-Luv stickers that can be used on scale cars, cellphones... even real cars!
description: This sticker set featuring the characters from Muv-Luv can be used on a multitude of things - from 1/18th scale cars, to real cars, cellphones, computers - the potential uses are limitless!

These seals are based on the images used on the official âge Lamborghini Gallardo and the Lancia Stratos itasha, and fill two large A3 sheets, meaning there are more than enough stickers to use wherever you need. Muv-Luv Alternative's popular Valkyrie Brigade insignia is also included. Made in Japan using a high quality material that won't fade easily!
name: GSR Character Customize Series: Muv-Luv - 1/18 Scale Seals 02 (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ きゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず しーるせっと02／マブラヴ 1/18すけーるよう)

subtitle: The only one who can complete the tag team is her! figma Sakura Hime!
description: Plawres Sanshiro is a manga that began in the 80's which quickly received an anime adaption. Even now it still holds popularity with its many fans, and along with figma Juohmaru comes a figma to partner with him, Sakura Hime!

The figma project was originally created as a joint effort between Masaki Asai and Max Factory using these figures as concept models - and now that we have reached the first year anniversary of figma, what better a time could there be to release the two figures that started the figma legend?
features: The original concept model behind the creation of the figma series of figures.
Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
Her nimble, flexible body has been faithfully recreated, allowing many poses that show her true charm.
A flexible plastic was used between the legs, making sure that proportions were kept, without compromising the posability.
Three faces are included, including an expressionless face, and various hand parts are also included allowing for a virtually unlimited number of poses.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Sakura Hime (Original Edition): JPWA Tag Tournament ver. (ふぃぐま さくらひめ（げんさくばん） JPWAたっぐとーなめんとver. )
copyright: © 牛次郎・神矢みのる・秋田書店2009

subtitle: The dignified king of knights, who always keeps her distant dream in her heart, and now...
description: Finally a PVC product line has started from the new figure makers, Gift! The first figure to be released is the ultimate servant, Saber, from "Fate/Stay Night". The beautiful sculpting work has been done by Satoshi Toda, and he has created a figure that not only shows Saber's vigor as the king of knights, but also shows her delicacy. As a special first production extra, head parts sculpted by Ikuma Kuramoto (Millimeter Models) will be included. Don't miss out on this otherwise impossible collaboration!
name: Saber (せいばー)

subtitle: The long-awaited third figure in the Muv-Luv series!
description: From the PC game with thousands of fanatical fans "Muv-Luv Alternative" comes a PVC figure of the main heroine, Sumika Kagami! She is wearing the reinforced suit that she wears while riding the Susanoo 4th Model. She's holding a heart as a personal motif of her energetic, cheerful personality, which has been captured beautifully in this figure. The carefully sculpted base can be connected to the other three bases in the series.
name: Sumika Kagami (かがみ すみか)

subtitle: Sculpted with all the charm from the illustration!!
description: The second in the set of figures based on original illustrations drawn by the popular artist Shunya Yamashita, just for the LILICS series of figures! Sculpted in a unique pose, while holding a huge sword, leaves this figure with both an artistic and sensual feel. Two of Shunya Yamashita's specialties - cute eyes and a mature body have both been wonderfully sculpted into this figure. Her costume makes use of a design which creates a beautiful blend of science fiction and fantasy elements. Enjoy the originality and skill behind the LILICS series!
name: Nasca (なすか)

subtitle: A cute girl with a massive weapon!!
description: A figure based on the original character drawn by famous manga artist Mine Yoshizaki. She is sculpted in a cute costume that brings out her bodyline, with an overwhelmingly huge weapon that looks far too big for her. She has large eyes and a vivid collar, which are both some of Mine Yoshizaki's specialities. She was sculpted by G.O from the popular Cerberus Project.
name: Limit Gunz (りみっとがんつ)
copyright: © 吉崎観音/マッグガーデン

subtitle: To avenge the death of his friend!
description: Guile, a major in the United States Air Force, has joined the Revolech SFO collection!
Combining his skills in various martial arts with his techniques as a professional wrestler, Guile formed his own personal fighting style - which can now be recreated using Revoltech joints.
Collect the rest of the figures that are due to come out in this series, and you can keep your favorite characters both by your side and in the game!
name: Revoltech SFO Guile (SFO がいる りぼるてっく)
copyright: © CAPCOM U.S.A., INC. 2008, © DALETTO CO., LTD. 2008 ALL RIGHTSRESERVED.

subtitle: The iron trooper, here to open the path to the future!
description: A new addition to the 35MAX series has been announced - another figure from "Armored Trooper VOTOMS: Commander Vorct", an original story which is currently being serialized in Hobby Japan magazine. This time we see the Scopedog Assault, a freshly designed mech ridden by the main character, Captain Rane. A turbo unit is included to recreate motion scenes, and pile bunkers can be attached to various parts of the mech using electromagnets. The head parts that were used during underwater exploration are also included. This perfection is truly suited to the strongest of the ATs!
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES CV-05: Commando Vorct Scopedog Assasult - Rane Custom (あさるとれーんかすたむ こまんどふぉーくと)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department (Yagi Atsushi)

subtitle: A master of the sword, revered by men across the world.
description: An original character from Street Fighter Online, based on a character from the Chinese novel "The Smiling, Proud Wanderer" written by Jinyong. Reikochuu has been added to the SFO Revoltech Collection! With an unbeatable skill in swordplay, Reikochuu is a user of the Dugu Nine Swords, but is also a do-gooder and a cheerful drinker.
Using the separate parts of each of the characters in the series, you can create your own original characters. Link the games with the figures and get that K.O.!
name: Revoltech SFO Reikochuu (SFO れいこちゅう りぼるてっく)
copyright: © CAPCOM U.S.A., INC. 2008, © DALETTO CO., LTD. 2008 ALL RIGHTSRESERVED.

subtitle: What's that coming into view? A lot of bare skin... and a pumpkin!
description: Following the release of Chuchu Astram from the popular PC game "Chu X Chu Idol" comes the kind-hearted manager, Pixie Hiyori! Although she normally has a very calm, relaxed personality, these clothes from the demon world definitely give her a much more provocative appearance! The pumpkin hat on her head is also a charming addition to her costume. Not to mention that both that costume and the pumpkin can be removed, allowing you to display an even sexier Hiyori whenever you want!
name: Pixie Hiyori (ひより・ぴくしー)

subtitle: Pressing even further into the battle!
description: ATELIER-SAI brings you the seventh figure set in the new "Battle Soldiers" series as a part of the revolutionary "GENEBLOCK" toy series. The battle between the "Guardian Side" and the "Bloody Sword Side" has just become even more devastating than before. Each of the figures in the series are created with a simple framework, which creates warriors that can be moved and played with easily. Each character has their own specific weapon included. Even more fun will open up to you once you've collected the whole set of warriors!
name: BATTLE SOLDIERS 7 (ばとるそるじゃーず だい７だん)

subtitle: Good wife! Dictator! Scary wife! Nendoroid Kyouka Midarezaki!
description: From the popular anime "Kyouran Kazoku Nikki", comes a nendoroid of the Midarezaki family's mother, Kyouka Midarezaki! At first glance she looks like a little girl with cat ears and a tail, but she actually claims that she is 20 years old! Her egotistical presence has been faithfully recreated in this figure, whilst also keeping her cute appearance in mind. Three face parts are included, and the third daughter of the Midarezaki family, Gekka Midarezaki is also included!
name: Nendoroid Kyouka Midarezaki (みだれざき きょうか)
series: Kyouran Kazoku Nikki (Diary of a Crazed Family)
copyright: © 2008 Akira／PUBLISHED BY ENTERBRAIN,INC.／超常現象対策局分室

subtitle: The final master of the Book of Darkness, figma Hayate Yagami - Set Up!
description: From Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS comes a figma of the commanding officer of Riot Force 6 - Hayate Yagami, wearing her knight armour.
features: The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes
One of the two face parts included has been sculpted to depict Hayate's truly determined expression.
Her armed device "Schwertkruez" is included, as well as the "Book of Darkness" which can be held both open, and closed.
The feathers on her back are made from a clear plastic, and along with her hat can be removed, allowing for even more poses.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Hayate Yagami: Knight Armour ver. (ふぃぐま やがみはやて きしかっちゅうver.)

subtitle: The cute mermaid walking down the path of chivalry - figma San Seto!
description: From the anime "Seto no Hanayome" comes a figma of the profound and proud heroine San Seto, wearing her Isono 8th Junior High school uniform!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for her uniform and skirt, making sure that proportions were kept, without compromising the posability.
Interchangeable parts are included to recreate her mermaid transformation that occurs when she gets wet.
A long yakuza sword is included along with a scabbard that it can be sheathed in. The catears from episode 20 are also included.
Face parts allowing for either a smiling face or a cold glare are included; as well as various hand parts, including one used to hold the sword.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma San Seto (せとさん ふぃぐま)
copyright: © 木村太彦/スクウェアエニックス･瀬戸内魚類協同組合

subtitle: The perfect new year's gift for that special person... or just for yourself.
description: The cute girls from Lucky Star are back again in Nendoroid Petiteform, this time wearing beautiful miko dresses to celebrate the New Year! Each of the girls comes with a little personal extra, such as a wooden plaque offering, or a paper fortune. Even the stands are made to look like a paved path that would be found at a New Year's festival, making it the perfect item to celebrate the new year!
4 Nendoroid Petites, a papercraft torii gate, and 6 re-usable stickers for the plaque offerings are all included in this "Happy New Year" set!!
Reservations start November 1st 2008 (Saturday) from 9am at Tokimeki Mall, Circle K and SUNKUS stores (excluding certain stores)
name: Nendoroid Petite: Lucky Star New Year Set (らきすた おねんがせっと ねんどろいど ぷち)
copyright: © 美水かがみ／らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: She may be small... but this a still a huge figure!
description: With the new OVA's release date decided, the Kodomo no Jikan anime stays ever popular. Now a new figure of the elementary school heroine Rin Kokonoe is here - and this time she's in her gym uniform.

She has been sculpted as an incredible 1/4 scale figure, with her uniform and bloomers made entirely from cloth for a truly realistic recreation. She sits and gazes ahead in her uniform, with a slightly erotic appeal that you would never expect from an elementary student. The stand looks as if it is a gymnastics mat, adding even more feeling of the figure.
name: Rin Kokonoe: Gym Uniform ver. (ここのえりん たいそうふくばーじょん)
copyright: © 私屋カヲル／こどものじかん製作委員会

subtitle: A Blu-Ray, DVD and Nendoroid Petites! The super special edition to keep forever!
description: Just one simple picture and music by ryo has expanded into a fully animated feature by ordet! The popular anime "Black Rock Shooter" is here in the best possible audio and video quality on a Blu-Ray disc. The Blu-ray edition also has various retaken scenes and a pilot trailer of the BRS Stop Motion, as well as the making of the Stop Motion. The best part of it all - it'll only set your wallet back by 4000JPY!

The story of two girls bound in friendship, as well as BRS's struggle unfolding in another world. But when the two worlds come together... what will happen? The innocent yet intense feelings in the girls of Black Rock Shooter can now be yours to watch and rewatch with this special package!
[Cast] Kuroi Mato: Kana Hanazawa Takanashi Yomi: Miyuki Sawashiro Yuu: Kana Asumi

[Staff] Original Work: huke Music: ryo Director: Yoshioka Shinobu Scenario: Nagaru Tanigawa and Yoshioka Shinobu Character Design/Photography: Yuusuke Matsuo Supervising Editor: Yutaka Yamamoto Animation Work: Ordet
Art Director: Emi Kesamaru Coloring Designs: Kazuko Nakajima (A-1 Pictures) Photography Director: Takeshi Hirooka (Asterism) Sound Director: Hiromi Kikuta (Rakuonsha)
Theme Song: Braveheart by THE GOMBAND
name: Black Rock Shooter Blu-ray & DVD Set (Limited First Edition) (ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー Blu-ray＆DVDセット（しょかいげんていせいさん）)

subtitle: The famous Black Rock Shooter in the exquisite quality of Blu-ray!
description: Just one simple picture and music by ryo has expanded into a fully animated feature by ordet! The popular anime "Black Rock Shooter" is here in the best possible audio and video quality on a Blu-Ray disc. The Blu-ray edition also has various retaken scenes and a pilot trailer of the BRS Stop Motion, as well as the making of the Stop Motion.

The story of two girls bound in friendship, as well as BRS's struggle unfolding in another world. But when the two worlds come together... what will happen? The innocent yet intense feelings in the girls of Black Rock Shooter can now be yours to watch and rewatch with this special package!
